abilities.name: Mist Coil
abilities.description: Abaddon releases a coil of deathly mist that can damage an enemy unit or heal a friendly unit at the cost of some of Abaddon's health.

abilities.name: Aphotic Shield
abilities.description:
Summons dark energies around an ally unit, creating an all damage barrier that absorbs a set amount of damage before expiring. When the barrier is destroyed it will burst and deal damage equal to the amount it could absorb to an area around it. Removes certain types of negative buffs and stuns on cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Curse of Avernus
abilities.description: Abaddon strikes an enemy, slowing the target's movement speed. If the target gets hit 4.0 times, they become affected by a chilling curse causing them to be silenced and slowed, and all attacks against them gain an attack speed boost.

abilities.name: Borrowed Time
abilities.description:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.0.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Curse of Avernus
abilities.description: Causes Mist Coil to deal Abaddon's attack damage on impact. Increases Curse of Avernus base slow.

abilities.name: Borrowed Time
abilities.description: Increases duration. While Borrowed Time is active, anytime an ally takes more than 525.0 damage while within 1200.0 range of Abaddon, an individual Mist Coil will automatically fire towards that ally.

abilities.name: Acid Spray
abilities.description: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction
abilities.description: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. Alchemist is faster while charging the concoction. After 5.0 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

abilities.name: Corrosive Weaponry
abilities.description: Alchemist coats his weapons with an acid that applies a stacking slow and status resistance reduction to enemies hit.

abilities.name: Chemical Rage
abilities.description:
Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and health regeneration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Berserk Potion
abilities.description:
Alchemist throws a potion at an ally, applying a basic dispel and giving them attack speed, movement speed and HP regen.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Chemical Rage
abilities.description: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades. Alchemist will gain bonus damage and spell amplification for each gifted Scepter.

abilities.name: Flux
abilities.description:
Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, dealing damage over time. The damage is not applied if another enemy unit is near the target.

Arc Warden:

Slows the target's movement speed.

Tempest Double:

Movement speed slow is decreased, but damage is increased.

abilities.name: Magnetic Field
abilities.description:
Arc Warden:

Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that grants bonus attack speed and protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

Tempest Double:

Allies gain bonus attack range and deal bonus magic damage with their attacks. Duration is increased.

abilities.name: Spark Wraith
abilities.description:
Arc Warden:

Summons a Spark Wraith that slowly materializes and patrols a targeted area until an enemy comes within its range. Once a target has been found the wraith fuses with them, dealing magical damage and slowing the unit.

Tempest Double:

Increased Wraith Speed and slow duration, decreased Activation Delay and Damage.

abilities.name: Tempest Double
abilities.description: Briefly refocusing its fractured elements into a single form, the Arc Warden is able to create a perfect electrical duplication of itself. The duplicate can use all of Arc Warden's current items and special Tempest Double versions of his spells, except most consumables and items that drop on death. The duplicate has separate item and ability cooldowns.  The Tempest Double gives bounty gold to enemies when killed. The Tempest Double loses its sense of self if he is too far away from Arc Warden and deals less attack damage.

abilities.name: Magnetic Field
abilities.description: Magnetic Field pushes enemies out of the area when cast and slows them while they are in it. Also provides allies inside with magic resistance.

abilities.name: Spark Wraith
abilities.description: Causes Spark Wraiths to spawn a new Spark Wraith after impacting an enemy, which then starts its 2.0 second activation period. The new Spark Wraiths last 15.0 seconds and has a radius of 225.0

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.description: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.description: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. The damage is increased by a factor of Axe's armor. The enemy is also slowed as long as they are facing away from Axe.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.description: After a set number of attacks, Axe will perform a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.description: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, dealing pure damage. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, Axe gains bonus armor permanently and all nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.description: Counter Helix now applies a stacking debuff to enemies hit by it that causes them to deal less total attack damage to Axe. Counter Helix no longer has a cooldown.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.description: Berserker's Call applies Battle Hunger to affected units. Reduces Berserker's Call cooldown.

abilities.name: Sticky Napalm
abilities.description: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10.0 stacks. Applies a small amount of damage with each cast.

abilities.name: Flamebreak
abilities.description: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, slowing and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Firefly
abilities.description: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider.

abilities.name: Flaming Lasso
abilities.description: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.

abilities.name: Sticky Napalm
abilities.description: Flaming Lasso no longer disarms you. Every other attack applies a stack of Sticky Napalm.

abilities.name: Flaming Lasso
abilities.description: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 650.0 units. The secondary target is tethered to the first.

abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.description: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack and deals damage equal to a percentage of the mana burnt. Enemies with no mana left are temporarily slowed.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Counterspell
abilities.description: Passively grants magic resistance. Counterspell may be activated to create an anti-magic shell around Anti-Mage that blocks and sends any targeted spells back towards enemies instead.

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.description: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

abilities.name: Counterspell
abilities.description: Counterspell passively grants an aura that reduces enemy spell damage. The reduction is stronger in close range.

abilities.name: Blink Fragment
abilities.description: Blinks an illusion to the target enemy or location, which attacks for a brief time. Counterspell is replicated on the Blink Fragment illusion. Has 3 Charges.

abilities.name: Cold Feet
abilities.description: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Vortex
abilities.description: Creates a vortex of icy energy that deals damage, slows and increases magic damage done to enemies in its range.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.description: Enhances Ancient Apparition's attack with increased range, heavy magic damage, and movement slow.

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.description: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.description: Freezes enemies hit with the current level of Cold Feet for 0.0% of the duration.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.description: Removes cooldown and reduces manacost by %bonus_AbilityManaCost%%.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.description: Deals damage every second and lowers the enemy's total attack damage and cast range.

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.description: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.description: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when damaged. If the target was directly attacked, the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every 0.5 seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.description: Causes Brain Sap to become a 0.0 AoE spell. Secondary targets only heal for 0.0%.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.description: Reduces Fiend's Grip cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%. Fiend's Grip now creates two uncontrollable illusions that are also channeling Fiend's Grip on the target. Illusions take 0.0% incoming damage and immediately die if they are interrupted. Damage does not stack.

abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.description: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and briefly slowing the target.  The shuriken will bounce to any Tracked units who are within a 1200.0 radius of each other.  Deals bonus damage to Tracked targets.

abilities.name: Jinada
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, dealing bonus damage and stealing some unreliable gold.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will stun the target for a short duration.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.description: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Bounty Hunter moves fast when near the tracked unit and deals critical strikes when attacking it. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold. Casting Track does not take you out of invisibility.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.description: Lowers cooldown and can be cast on allied heroes. Allied fade time is 1.0s. Does not break Bounty Hunter's invisibility when cast on allies.

abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.description: Increases cast range and applies Jinada on hit.

abilities.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.description: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.

abilities.name: Quill Spray
abilities.description: Sprays enemy units with quills dealing damage in an area of effect around Bristleback.  Deals bonus damage for every time a unit was hit by Quill Spray in the last 14.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Bristleback
abilities.description: Bristleback takes less damage if hit on the sides or rear.  If Bristleback takes 225.0 damage from the rear, he releases a Quill Spray of the current level.

abilities.name: Warpath
abilities.description: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

abilities.name: Hairball
abilities.description: Coughs a quill-packed hairball towards the target location. Erupts at the location, hitting enemies in with Viscous Nasal Goo and stacks of Quill Spray.

abilities.name: Viscous Nasal Goo
abilities.description: Viscous Nasal Goo becomes a no target area of effect ability, applying to all enemies within range. Increases stack limit.

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

abilities.name: Reality Rift
abilities.description: Teleports Chaos Knight, any illusions he has, and the target unit to a point along the line between him and the target. Reduces armor of the enemy unit for 6.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Chaos Strike
abilities.description: Chaos Knight and his illusions' attacks have a chance to deal a critical strike of varying strength with bonus lifesteal. Deals 1.5x damage to creeps, but lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50.0%.

abilities.name: Phantasm
abilities.description:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. The phantasms are strong illusions that deal 100.0% damage, but take 325.0% damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.description: Increases  the cast range of Chaos Bolt, and causes it to create a Phantasm illusion to attack the target.

abilities.name: Phantasm
abilities.description: Creates an illusion of allied heroes globally. Creates an additional illusion for Chaos Knight as well.

abilities.name: Hoof Stomp
abilities.description: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.description: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target. Deals extra damage based on your strength. Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

abilities.name: Retaliate
abilities.description: Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker. Returns a fixed amount plus a percentage of your strength. Deals half damage to towers.

abilities.name: Stampede
abilities.description: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and slow any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.

abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.description: Causes Double Edge to slow enemy heroes and increase Centaur's strength per hero hit for a short time. Duration refreshes per stack, up to a max of 0.0 stacks.

abilities.name: Hitch A Ride
abilities.description: Centaur tosses an ally into a cart hitched behind him. While in the cart, Centaur gains the benefit of Stampede and the ally can still cast and attack normally, but cannot move independently or be targeted by opponents. Non-targeted effects can still affect the hitched ally. Increases the attack range of melee heroes by 200.0.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.description: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Cinder Brew
abilities.description: Drenches himself and an area in alcohol, causing enemy units to move slower and ignited once they take any spell damage. Duration is increased by 3.0 seconds when enemies are ignited. While Brewmaster is Brewed Up, His Drunken Brawler Stances are stronger.

abilities.name: Drunken Brawler
abilities.description:
Brewmaster can switch stances based on the elements he controls, gaining passive bonuses that improve against enemies when Brewed Up.

Earth Brawler

- Grants 1.0 armor and 5.0% Magic Resistance. Bonuses are 3.0x when Brewed Up.

Storm Brawler

- Grants 15.0% evasion and 5.0% Bonus Move Speed. Bonuses are 3.0x when Brewed Up.

Fire Brawler

- Grants 24.0% chance to critical strike for 145.0% of your attack damage. Chance is 3.0x when Brewed Up.



Void Brawler

- Grants 5.0% bonus Status Resistance to Brewmaster and applies a 10.0% Slow for 2.0s on attack. Slow and Status Resistance are 3.0x when affected by Cinder Brew.

abilities.name: Primal Split
abilities.description: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 4 specialized warriors, adept at survival, each with their own abilities. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

abilities.name: Primal Split
abilities.description: Increases Primal Split duration and allows it to be cancelled early.

abilities.name: Primal Companion
abilities.description:
Creates a Brewling based on Brewmaster's current Drunken Brawler Stance. If the Brewling moves 1600.0 range away from Brewmaster, it can no longer cast spells and is slowed by 50.0%. Otherwise, all of the Brewling spells have a 100.0% cooldown penalty.

A new Brewling cannot be resummoned for 3.0s if the current one takes damage from enemy Heroes or hero-controlled units. If the Brewling dies, the ability goes on cooldown for 70.0 seconds.

Only one Brewling can exist at a time. If Brewmaster uses Primal Split, the existing Brewling disappears.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Drives Bloodseeker into a bloodthirsty rage which causes him to attack faster and deal more spell damage at the cost of a percentage of his health per second. Provides half attack speed to allied heroes.

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.description: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 2.9 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.description: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, restoring some life when he kills a unit. Restores for half values when denying, or if an ally kills a nearby enemy hero. Also gains bonus movement speed when an enemy hero's health falls below 80.0%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below 25.0%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero. Unlocks max movement speed for Bloodseeker.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.description: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture, dealing initial damage based on its current health. If the unit moves, it takes damage based on the distance moved.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.description: Bloodrage attacks now deal 1.8% of the target’s max health as pure damage and heals Bloodseeker for that amount. Only works for Bloodseeker.

abilities.name: Blood Mist
abilities.description: Bloodseeker sprays his blood continuously in the area around him, losing health to damage and slow his enemies. While active, Thirst's healing is increased. Cannot be turned off while on cooldown. Additionally, passively turns all your overheal from your own abilities into an all damage barrier up to 50% of Bloodseeker's Max Health. Barrier amount decays by 0.5% per second.

abilities.name: Wild Axes
abilities.description: Beastmaster sends his axes flying and calls them home again, slicing through enemy units and trees along their path.  Each axe can hit an enemy once, and amplifies subsequent damage from Beastmaster and his units.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Boar
abilities.description: Beastmaster calls forth a Boar to aid in the battlefield. The Boar has a passive poison attack that slows attack and movement speeds.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
abilities.description: Beastmaster sends an invisible Hawk to scout an area.

abilities.name: Inner Beast
abilities.description: Untaps the inner fury of nearby allies, passively increasing their attack speed.

abilities.name: Primal Roar
abilities.description: Beastmaster lets loose a deafening roar that stuns, and shoves open a path to its target. All units in the path of the roar are damaged, while units shoved aside by the roar have their movement and attack speed slowed. Additionally, Beastmaster and his units gain 40.0% movement speed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Call of the Wild Hawk
abilities.description: Reduces Hawk cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s and Hawks gain Dive Bomb. If set to autocast, the Hawk will automatically dive bomb the first available target.

abilities.name: Drums of Slom
abilities.description:
Attacks from Beastmaster or a nearby unit he controls will cause him bang his drum, dealing damage to nearby units and healing Beastmaster and units under his control for a portion of the damage dealt. Every attack decreases the interval between drum hits down to a minimum of 0.4s between hits after 20.0 attacks. If no attacks are made, the intervals gradually increase.

Using Primal Roar counts as 10/15/20 attacks, based on the current level of Primal Roar.

abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.description: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

abilities.name: Spin Web
abilities.description: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, increases her Turn Rate, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity, as well as giving free movement. Spin Web charges restore every 30.0 seconds, with a max of %AbilityCharges% charges. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. The movement bonus is proportional to the unit's HP

abilities.name: Silken Bola
abilities.description: Deals impact damage, then slows the target and causes them to miss some attacks. Units that attack the target deal bonus magic damage.

abilities.name: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.description: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.description: Increases duration. While Hunger is active, the bonus damage is increased by 0.0% every 1.0s.

abilities.name: Spinner's Snare
abilities.description: Broodmother may create up to 5.0 invisible web lines touching any existing web. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will spring the trap, becoming rooted, revealed in fog, and take damage over time.  Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until it's destroyed after being initially triggered.  Broodmother's team is alerted via the minimap when an enemy has triggered the snare.

abilities.name: Penitence
abilities.description: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and for allies to attack it more quickly.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.description:
Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep and receives gold equal to its bounty. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum. Converted creeps will have increased movement speed and bonus damage.

Can be cast on converted creeps to teleport them to Chen. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen will be teleported to him. Taking damage will dispel the buff.

abilities.name: Divine Favor
abilities.description: Passively provides an aura that grants increased health regeneration and armor.

abilities.name: Hand of God
abilities.description: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control. A large heal is applied at first and a slow heal over time is applied for 8.0 seconds afterwards.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.description: Allows Holy Persuasion to target Ancient creeps. Can control up to 1/2/3 Ancient creeps based on Hand of God's level. Additionally levels up some abilities of creeps by 1 level.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.description: Grants persuaded creeps Martyrdom ability. Sacrifice the life of this unit to heal any ally with the current level of Hand of God.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description:
Clinkz gains attack speed and has bonus attack range. Any current Burning Skeleton Archers skeletons within a 1200.0 radius of Clinkz also gain bonus attack range and 50.0% of the attack speed bonus.

Casting Strafe does not break Skeleton Walk invisibility.

abilities.name: Tar Bomb
abilities.description:
Clinkz throws a projectile filled with tar at the target enemy, dealing Magic damage on impact. After impact, the tar spills onto the ground and stays there for 5.0 seconds. Any enemy that walks across it gets slowed, and attacks from Clinkz or his Burning Army Skeleton Archers will deal bonus physical damage.

When the Tar Bomb hits, any Burning Army skeletons within attack range will attack the target.

abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.description:
Clinkz consumes the target enemy creep or friendly skeleton and creates a Burning Skeleton Archer in their place, healing and gaining max health. Does not take Clinkz out of Skeleton Walk.

Archers are immobile and die within several attacks from a hero. Skeletons deal a percentage of Clinkz' damage. Attack range is equal to Clinkz's attack range. Only one archer can be summoned from Death Pact at a time.

Skeletons deal 25.0% less damage to buildings

abilities.name: Skeleton Walk
abilities.description: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses items. Leaving Skeleton Walk creates Burning Skeleton Archers

abilities.name: Burning Barrage
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Clinkz channels and shoots multiple piercing arrows in the target direction that hit all enemy units dealing a percentage of Clinkz' attack damage and applying attack modifiers, and dousing enemies with Tar Bomb slow.

abilities.name: Burning Army
abilities.description: Summons a row of Burning Skeleton Archers in the target location.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.description: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.description: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing damage over time. Lasts 10.0 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.description: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. Allies within a 1200.0 radius of Crystal Maiden receive 3.0x the mana regeneration. Crystal Maiden herself receives 6.0x the bonus.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with 100 random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage. Grants bonus armor while channeling. Lasts 10.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description: Allows you to move, cast and attack during Freezing Field. Can still be interrupted by enemies. You move 0.0% slower during this. Increases total number of explosions by 0.0%.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.description: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over -1.0s.

abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.description: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Ion Shell
abilities.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of phased movement speed. Allows the unit to reach maximum movement speed and cannot be slowed.

abilities.name: Wall of Replica
abilities.description: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Surged units leave behind a 0.0 radius trail that lasts 7.0s, slows enemies around it by -50.0% and deals 35.0 damage per second in 0.5s intervals. Can be put on autocast to disable the trail.

abilities.name: Normal Punch
abilities.description: Passive ability. Causes Dark Seer's next attack on a hero to have True Strike, knock a replica out of the victim, damaging and stunning them based on how far Dark Seer has moved in the past 3.0 seconds. Max power is reached after 900.0 distance moved.

abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.description: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun. Deals double damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Power Cogs
abilities.description: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near. Allies in the cogs when they are created receive a magic damage barrier. Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

abilities.name: Rocket Flare
abilities.description: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area. Upon impact, enemies in the area take damage and are briefly slowed. Rocket flare provides vision over the impact area for 6.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.description: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage to everyone in a 175.0 radius around the hit target.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.

abilities.name: Jetpack
abilities.description: Clockwerk activates a jetpack, gaining flying movement, flying vision, and bonus movement speed. Clockwerk has a severely-limited turn rate during this time and cannot attack. Jetpack is cancelled upon casting Hookshot.

abilities.name: Overclocking
abilities.description: Supercharges Clockwerks abilities: Battery Assault affects all enemies in it's range; Clockwerk's attack speed in Power Cogs is increased; Rocket Flares have a reduced cooldown and fire additional rockets to either side of the target; Hookshot stun radius and duration is increased. Clockwerk becomes stunned after the duration runs out.

abilities.name: Bramble Maze
abilities.description: Dark Willow creates a maze of brambles that grow in the target area after 0.3 seconds.  Enemies that walk into a bramble are rooted and take damage over time.

abilities.name: Shadow Realm
abilities.description: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable.  Her next attack has increased attack range and deals bonus magic damage, and will end Shadow Realm. Damage scales based on how long she remains under the effects of Shadow Realm, the maximum being reached after 3.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Cursed Crown
abilities.description: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.

abilities.name: Bedlam
abilities.description: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.

abilities.name: Terrorize
abilities.description: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.

abilities.name: Cursed Crown
abilities.description: Cursed Crown creates 4.0 brambles in a 175.0 radius around the target after the counter ends. Triggers even upon dispel. Reduces stun delay by 1.0 second.

abilities.name: Shadow Realm
abilities.description: Attacking no longer takes Dark Willow out of Shadow Realm. Each attack still has bonus damage based on the duration of the buff.

abilities.name: Starbreaker
abilities.description: Dawnbreaker whirls her hammer around 3 times, damaging enemies with her attack plus bonus damage. On the final strike, she smashes her hammer down, stunning and damaging enemies in front of her.

abilities.name: Celestial Hammer
abilities.description: Dawnbreaker hurls her weapon at a target, damaging enemies struck along the way. The hammer pauses for 2.0 seconds at the destination before flying back to her, leaving a trail of fire that slows enemies. Dawnbreaker can recall the hammer at any time, pulling her towards it so they meet in the middle.

abilities.name: Luminosity
abilities.description: After a number of attacks, Dawnbreaker powers up, charging her next attack with a critical hit that heals all allied heroes within 650.0 units around her for a portion of attack damage dealt. Creeps and neutral enemies provide less healing. Allies are healed for 50.0% of the amount.

abilities.name: Solar Guardian
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Dawnbreaker creates a pulsing effect at a location within 350.0 units of an allied hero anywhere on the map, damaging enemies and healing allies with each pulse. After a short duration, she flies to the target location, dealing additional damage and stunning enemies upon landing. Once channeled, Dawnbreaker cannot stop the ability.

abilities.name: Starbreaker
abilities.description: Dawnbreaker gains debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and free movement during Starbreaker. Dawnbreaker is slowed by 0.0% down to a minimum of 215.0.

abilities.name: Solar Guardian
abilities.description: Reduces the channel time and increases the healing and total duration of Solar Guardian's air time. Causes allies in the destination area to have evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne. Solar Guardian can be cast again after take off to land early. While airborne, the landing point of Solar Guardian can be moved at a speed of 200.0.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: Releases a cone of poison that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked by Dazzle, the debuff duration is refreshed and slow is increased.

abilities.name: Shallow Grave
abilities.description: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection. Healing on that ally is also amplified for the duration based on the hero's HP.

abilities.name: Shadow Wave
abilities.description: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any enemy units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

abilities.name: Bad Juju
abilities.description:
Whenever a Unit is affected by Dazzle's spells they temporarily gain/lose armor.

The spell can be activated by spending health to decrease the remaining cooldown of all other abilities and items. Casting Bad Juju temporarily increases its health cost.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: Causes Poison Touch to hex affected targets for 0.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Wave
abilities.description: Dazzle can now target enemies with Shadow Wave to create an Inverse Shadow Wave. The inverse wave bounces amonst enemies, dealing damage to them and healing any nearby allied units for 150.0% the healing and damage values of Shadow Wave. Dazzle will also perform an attack on any enemy hit by the Inverse Shadow Wave.

abilities.name: Crypt Swarm
abilities.description: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Fires a projectile that prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.description: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining health from the enemy.

abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.description:
Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. Spirits need to return back to Death Prophet in order to attack again. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt. Deals 50% damage to buildings. Lasts 35.0 seconds.
Passively grants Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.description: Increases Spirit Siphon charges by 1.0 and causes enemies to be feared for 1.2 seconds if they are siphoned for 3.0 seconds consecutively.

abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy is affected by Death Prophet's spells or when she attacks an enemy, a ghost will fly out, slow and hit the enemy for an increased bonus of its usual damage then return to her with life.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius and slows enemy movement and attack speed by 100.0% for 0.1 seconds.  Provides vision of its target.

abilities.name: Glimpse
abilities.description: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions. Deals damage based on distance glimpsed, with max damage dealt at 1400.0 distance.

abilities.name: Kinetic Field
abilities.description: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

abilities.name: Static Storm
abilities.description: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Increases the cast range and strike count of Thunder Strike. It can now also be ground targeted, where it will lie dormant for up to 5.0 seconds and attach to the first enemy that comes within the radius.

abilities.name: Static Storm
abilities.description: Mutes items.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Consumes an enemy or neutral creep, acquiring any special abilities that it possessed and gaining armor temporarily while it digests the creep. If autocast is deactivated, Doom will not acquire the creep's abilities. Duration is equal to the cooldown.

abilities.name: Scorched Earth
abilities.description: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies, while also granting him increased movement speed.

abilities.name: Infernal Blade
abilities.description: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.5 seconds and applies a 4.0 second burn that deals a base damage plus a percentage of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.description:
Inflicts a curse that dispels an enemy Hero and prevents them from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Infernal Blade
abilities.description: Infernal Blade stun duration is increased. If the enemy's level is a multiple of 3, or above level 24, they will be stunned for a longer duration and take bonus damage.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.description: Allies in a 0.0 radius around the doomed target also suffer the effects of Doom. Allows Doom to be self-cast to affect enemies around himself.

abilities.name: Breathe Fire
abilities.description:
Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

While in Dragon Form, applies the corresponding debuff from Corrosive Breath and Frost Breath when in those forms.

abilities.name: Dragon Tail
abilities.description: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.0.

abilities.name: Dragon Blood
abilities.description: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.description:
Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail's range, while granting him new powers.

LEVEL 1 Green Dragon

- Corrosive Breath: attacks deal 20.0 poison damage per second for 5.0 seconds. Works on structures.

LEVEL 2 Red Dragon

- Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 350.0 radius for 75.0% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.

LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon

- Frost Breath: slows movement speed by -40.0% and attack speed by -40.0 of enemy units in Splash Attack range for 3.0 seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.

abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.description: Increases the level of Dragon Knight's ultimate. Adds a 4th level, Black Dragon. Black Dragon has bonus Corrosive Damage, Splash Damage and Slow amount, 25% increased Magic Resistance and free pathing.

abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.description: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.description: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage and have 75.0 bonus attack range on the next attack.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

abilities.name: Echo Slam
abilities.description: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.

abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.description: Reduces Fissure cooldown and allows Earthshaker to walk on it. When he casts any ability, an Aftershock is released along its path that stuns for a shortened duration.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.description: Enchant Totem becomes a ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping. Grants Enchant Totem a cleaving attack.

abilities.name: Boulder Smash
abilities.description: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest unit in a 200.0 radius, prioritizing Stone Remnants. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units. Deals 1.3x damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Rolling Boulder
abilities.description: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a 0.5s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing 30.0 + 100.0% STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.

abilities.name: Geomagnetic Grip
abilities.description: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced and take damage.

abilities.name: Stone Remnant
abilities.description: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time. Gains additional charges every 5.0 hero levels.

abilities.name: Magnetize
abilities.description: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.

abilities.name: Geomagnetic Grip
abilities.description: Can now grab allies.

abilities.name: Enchant Remnant
abilities.description:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>

Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.

Has a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.description: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement and dealing bonus damage.  Slow lasts 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.description: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to Drow. Drow Gains Movement Speed for the same duration.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Drow releases a flurry of arrows in continuous salvos, hitting enemies for extra damage and applying longer duration Frost Arrows. Lasts up to 1.8 seconds.

abilities.name: Marksmanship
abilities.description: Drow's experiences in battle grant her a chance to launch arrows with incredible accuracy and effectiveness. Pierces through the enemy's defenses, ignoring their base armor. Grants Drow and nearby ranged heroes with bonus agility based on Drow's current agility, with allies receiving 50.0% of the bonus Drow receives. This ability is disabled if there is an enemy hero within 400.0 range.

abilities.name: Glacier
abilities.description: Drow Ranger creates a hill of ice beneath her. While standing on the hill, attackers gain bonus attack range and high ground advantage - they cannot miss and gain flying vision. Drow Ranger additionally gets bonus Multishot arrows per wave while on the hill. The front of the hill obscures vision and cannot be moved through.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.description: Frost Arrows now apply a Hypothermia stack to enemies, increasing damage from Frost Arrows and reducing their regeneration per stack. If an enemy dies with Hypothermia stacks, they burst and deal damage per stack and slow in an area around it.

abilities.name: Searing Chains
abilities.description: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

abilities.name: Sleight of Fist
abilities.description: Ember Spirit dashes around with blazing speed, attacking all enemies in the targeted area of effect, then returning to his start location.  Deals bonus damage to heroes.

abilities.name: Flame Guard
abilities.description: Ember Spirit surrounds himself with a ring of fire that creates a magic damage barrier, absorbing a percentage of the damage taken.  Flame Guard deals damage per second in an area around Ember Spirit while Flame Guard is active.  If the barrier is broken, the damage is also lost.

abilities.name: Activate Fire Remnant
abilities.description: Select the Fire Remnant to arrive at.

abilities.name: Fire Remnant
abilities.description: Sends a Fire Remnant that runs to the target location at 250.0% Ember Spirit's speed.  Using Activate Fire Remnant, Ember Spirit will dash out to all active Fire Remnants, destroying them and dealing damage in an area and then moving to the nearest Remnant.  Ember Spirit will end at the Remnant closest to the targeted location.

abilities.name: Fire Remnant
abilities.description: Fire Remnants deal damage per second in an area around them. If an enemy hero dies near Ember Spirit, a Fire Remnant charge will be replenished.

abilities.name: Fire Remnant
abilities.description: Increases cast range, initial remnant speed, and maximum charges.

abilities.name: Impetus
abilities.description: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt. Deals double damage to creeps and illusions.

abilities.name: Enchant
abilities.description:
Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control, increasing its attack damage and max health.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Nature's Attendants
abilities.description: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 9.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Untouchable
abilities.description: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

abilities.name: Little Friends
abilities.description: All creeps, ally, enemy and neutral within a radius will gain bonus movement and attack speed and attack Enchantress' chosen target for 6.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Sproink
abilities.description: Leaps backward, dodges incoming projectiles, and launches an Impetus attack on the 3.0 furthest enemy units within Enchantress' attack range + 200.0.

abilities.name: Echo Stomp
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

abilities.name: Astral Spirit
abilities.description:
Elder Titan sends forth his Astral Spirit, damaging any units it passes through. When the spirit rejoins the Titan, it grants bonus damage, armor, and movement speed for each unit it passed through.

The Astral Spirit can be controlled and possesses the Echo Stomp, Return Spirit, and Natural Order abilities.

abilities.name: Natural Order
abilities.description: Reduces all elements to their basic levels, removing base armor and magic damage resistance from nearby enemy units. The armor reduction is centered around the hero, while the magic armor reduction is centered around Astral Spirit.

abilities.name: Earth Splitter
abilities.description: Sends forth a jagged crack in front of Elder Titan. After 3 seconds, the crack implodes, slowing movement while dealing damage to each enemy based on their maximum life. Half of the damage dealt is Magical damage, while the other half is Physical damage.

abilities.name: Echo Stomp
abilities.description: Lowers Cooldown. Echo Stomp may be placed on autocast to allow Elder Titan to take the place of the Astral Spirit as it completes its stomp.

abilities.name: Astral Spirit
abilities.description: Causes Elder Titan to become debuff immune and gain 50% magic resistance for 2.0 seconds per affected enemy Hero when the spirit returns.

abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.description: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Demonic Conversion
abilities.description: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

abilities.name: Midnight Pulse
abilities.description: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their current HP.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.

abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.description: Increases Malefice stun duration by 0.35s and creates an Eidolon next to the target every instance of Malefice stun. These Eidolons will not multiply further.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: Black Hole deals additional damage equivalent to 3.5% of the unit's Max Health per second and does a non-interrupting pull towards it in a 1200.0 AoE. Pulls at a rate of 175.0.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.description: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last 2.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Time Dilation
abilities.description: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 8.0 seconds, extending their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 10.0% for each cooldown extended. Deals bonus damage per second for each cooldown. The debuff does not tick down while inside Chronosphere.

abilities.name: Time Lock
abilities.description: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time while attacking it a second time.

abilities.name: Chronosphere
abilities.description: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  All ability and item cooldowns are frozen. Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible enemies in the sphere will be revealed.

abilities.name: Reverse Time Walk
abilities.description: Available for 1.5 seconds after landing Time Walk. If used in this period, you will reverse your time walk back to your previous cast location. Does not affect health or proc scepter hits.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.description: Applies a Time Lock to all units at the landing destination.

abilities.name: Stroke of Fate
abilities.description: Grimstroke paints a path of ink with his brush, damaging and slowing enemies. The damage is increased with each enemy the ink hits.

abilities.name: Phantom's Embrace
abilities.description:
Summons a phantom that moves quickly towards the target, latching to it when she arrives. Once latched, the phantom damages and silences. If she survives the full latch duration she rends her victim for heavy damage and refreshes Phantom's Embrace's cooldown.

Hero attacks against the phantom count as 3 attacks each.

abilities.name: Ink Swell
abilities.description: Grimstroke shrouds an allied unit in ink, increasing its movement speed. Enemies in range of the allied unit are damaged with inky tendrils over time. After 3.0 seconds it triggers, applying damage and stun in an area around the unit in proportion to how long ink tendril was near any hero.

abilities.name: Soulbind
abilities.description: Binds a targeted enemy hero to its nearest allied hero within the bind radius, preventing both from moving away from each other. Any unit-targeted ability that either bound hero receives also gets cast on the other hero. If the bind is broken before the duration expires, the initial target will be bound to its nearest allied hero in the radius.

abilities.name: Ink Swell
abilities.description:
Causes Ink Swell to deal 40.0% more damage and heal the target for 40.0% of the damage Ink Swell deals. Upon expiration, the target will receive a strong dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Dark Portrait
abilities.description: Creates an ink illusion of a target enemy hero. Illusion is debuff immune, has 95% magic resistance, and has bonus movement speed and attack damage.

abilities.name: Acorn Shot
abilities.description:
Fires Hoodwink's attack with an acorn at the target unit. The acorn bounces to nearby targets, slowing them and dealing a percentage of Hoodwink's attack with bonus damage.

If point targeted, a tree is created at the target position and the acorn will bounce to nearby targets. The ability may be placed on auto-cast to force this behavior.

abilities.name: Bushwhack
abilities.description: Tosses a net trap that stuns enemies if they are near a tree in the area.  Affected enemies take damage over time and are pulled towards the tree nearest to them within the target area, and have their vision reduced to 0 for the duration of the stun.

abilities.name: Scurry
abilities.description: Hoodwink passively has a chance to evade physical attacks while near trees.  When activated, Hoodwink gains bonus movement speed, phased collision, and tree-walking for a brief time.

abilities.name: Sharpshooter
abilities.description:
Hoodwink charges up and fires a deadly bolt from her crossbow, dealing heavy damage, break and slow to an enemy Hero. The damage and debuff duration scale up to max after 3.0 seconds, and the bolt is fired automatically after 5.0 seconds.

Hoodwink is knocked backwards for a distance of 350.0 from the force of the shot.

abilities.name: Hunter's Boomerang
abilities.description: Tosses a boomerang in an arc. Upon contact, it returns to Hoodwink.  The boomerang will deal damage as it passes through or hits enemies, and apply a Hunter's Mark that causes affected enemies to be slowed and be more vulnerable to spell damage.

abilities.name: Decoy
abilities.description: Hoodwink turns invisible, increasing her movement speed, and creates a decoy illusion that starts aiming a decreased damage Sharpshooter at the nearest enemy hero. If the illusion is attacked or hit by a targeted ability, it is destroyed and it throws a lesser bushwhack towards the enemy.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.description: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Homing Missile
abilities.description: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target. Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

abilities.name: Flak Cannon
abilities.description: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 12.0 seconds or until the attacks are used.

abilities.name: Call Down
abilities.description: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area. After 2.0 seconds, two missiles arrive in succession, with 2.0 seconds between them.

abilities.name: Homing Missile
abilities.description: Homing Missiles now constantly fires the current level of Rocket Barrage in a 700.0 area of effect after 1.0 second of being cast. This Rocket Barrage prioritizes the Homing Missile target.

abilities.name: Flak Cannon
abilities.description: Adds a Side Gunner that at random attacks enemy units near Gyrocopter. Prioritizes furthest unit away within its range.

abilities.name: Inner Fire
abilities.description: In a fiery rage, knocks all nearby enemies away from you to a fixed distance, dealing damage and disarming them.

abilities.name: Burning Spear
abilities.description: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.

abilities.name: Berserker's Blood
abilities.description: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed, magic resistance and health regen based on missing health. Health regen is a percentage of your strength.

abilities.name: Life Break
abilities.description:
Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them. While leaping, Huskar is Debuff Immune and has 50% increases magic resistance.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Inner Fire
abilities.description: Lowers Inner Fire cooldown and causes it to apply a movement speed slow and heal Huskar for a percentage of the damage dealt to enemies.

abilities.name: Life Break
abilities.description: Forces the enemy target to attack Huskar and increases cast range.

abilities.name: Dual Breath
abilities.description: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

abilities.name: Ice Path
abilities.description: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

abilities.name: Liquid Fire
abilities.description: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

abilities.name: Macropyre
abilities.description: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.

abilities.name: Liquid Frost
abilities.description: Jakiro adds a frost effect to his attack. Enemies hit are slowed for 4.0 seconds and are damaged for a percent of their max health plus a base amount every 1.0 second for 4.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Macropyre
abilities.description: Increases Macropyre distance by +400.0 range, duration by +15.0 seconds and causes it to become Pure damage that pierces debuff immunity.

abilities.name: Quas
abilities.description:
Allows manipulation of ice elements. Passively grants +2 Strength per level. Each

Quas

instance provides increased health regeneration.

abilities.name: Wex
abilities.description:
Allows manipulation of storm elements. Passively grants +2 Agility per level. Each

Wex

instance provides increased attack speed and movement speed.

abilities.name: Exort
abilities.description:
Allows manipulation of fire elements. Passively grants +2 Intelligence per level. Each

Exort

instance provides increased attack damage.

abilities.name: Invoke
abilities.description:
Combines the properties of the elements currently being manipulated to create a new spell for Invoker to use. Invoke cooldown is reduced by 0.3 seconds for each orb level.

Click the help button to see the list of possible spells.

abilities.name: Cold Snap
abilities.description:
Invoker draws the heat from an enemy, chilling them to their very core for a duration based on the level of

Quas

. The enemy will take damage and be briefly frozen. Further damage taken in this state will freeze the enemy again, dealing bonus damage. The enemy can only be frozen so often, but the freeze cooldown decreases based on the level of

Quas

.

abilities.name: Ghost Walk
abilities.description:
Invoker manipulates the ice and electrical energies around him, rendering his body invisible. The elemental imbalance created as a consequence slows nearby enemies based on the level of

Quas

, and slows Invoker as well based on the level of

Wex

.

abilities.name: Tornado
abilities.description:
Unleashes a fast moving tornado that picks up enemy units in its path, suspending them helplessly in the air shortly before allowing them to plummet to their doom. Travels further based on the level of

Wex

. Holds enemies in the air for a duration based on the level of

Quas

. Deals base damage plus added damage based on levels in

Wex

.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: E.M.P.
abilities.description:
Invoker builds up a charge of electromagnetic energy at a targeted location which automatically detonates after 2.9 seconds. The detonation covers an area, draining mana based on the level of

Wex

. Deals damage for each point of mana drained. If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.

abilities.name: Alacrity
abilities.description:
Invoker infuses an ally with an immense surge of energy, increasing their attack speed based on the level of

Wex

and their damage based on the level of

Exort

.

abilities.name: Chaos Meteor
abilities.description:
Invoker pulls a flaming meteor from space onto the targeted location. Upon landing, the meteor rolls forward, constantly dealing damage based on the level of

Exort

, and rolling further based on the level of

Wex

. Units hit by the meteor will also be set on fire for a short time, receiving additional damage based on the level of

Exort

.

abilities.name: Sun Strike
abilities.description:
Sends a catastrophic ray of fierce energy from the sun at any targeted location, incinerating all enemies standing beneath it once it reaches the earth. Deals damage based on the level of

Exort

, however this damage is spread evenly over all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Forge Spirit
abilities.description:
Invoker forges a spirit embodying the strength of fire and fortitude of ice. Damage and armor are based on the level of

Exort

while attack range, health, and duration are based on the level of

Quas

. The elemental's scorching attack is capable of melting the armor of enemy heroes. Spawns two spirits when Quas and Exort are at least level 4.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.description:
Generates a wall of solid ice directly in front of Invoker for a duration based on the level of

Quas

. The bitter cold emanating from it greatly slows nearby enemies based on the level of

Quas

and deals damage each second based on the level of

Exort

.

abilities.name: Deafening Blast
abilities.description:
Invoker unleashes a mighty sonic wave in front of him, dealing damage to any enemy unit it collides with based on the level of

Exort

. The sheer impact from the blast is enough to knock those enemy units back for a duration based on the level of

Quas

, then disarm their attacks for a duration based on the level of

Wex

.

abilities.name: E.M.P.
abilities.description: Increases damage for each point of mana drained by EMP and pulls enemy units into the EMP's center at 100.0 units per second.

abilities.name: Sun Strike
abilities.description: Creates a Cataclysm when Sun Strike is double tapped. Puts it on a 100.0 second cooldown. Creates 0.0 visible Sun Strikes within 160.0-200.0 range of each enemy hero. Additionally Increases the level of Quas, Wex and Exort by 1.

abilities.name: Tether
abilities.description: Tethers Io to an allied unit, granting bonus movement speed to both. When Io restores health or mana, the tethered unit gains a portion of that amount. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether. Tether briefly slows enemies touching it.

abilities.name: Spirits
abilities.description: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io. If a particle collides with an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirit, but do not cause them to explode.  When its duration ends, any remaining Spirits explode.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.description: Io gains bonus attack speed, spell amplification, and HP Regen based on max health.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.

abilities.name: Spirits In
abilities.description: Sends the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Spirits Out
abilities.description: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

abilities.name: Relocate
abilities.description: Teleports Io and a tethered ally to any location. After the spell expires, Io and the tethered ally will return to their original location. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

abilities.name: Overcharge
abilities.description: Increases Overcharge Spell Amplification, and Io gains Spell Lifesteal and can now share Spell Lifesteal with its tethered target.

abilities.name: Spirits
abilities.description: Spirits now passively spawn around Io constantly every second up to the max. Spirits colliding with enemy Heroes slows them briefly. Can be activated to explode spirits.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.description: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss some attacks. Knockback is 400.0 range over 0.6 seconds.

abilities.name: Chakra Magic
abilities.description: Restores mana to the target unit and reduces cooldowns of all abilities currently on cooldown by a fixed amount.

abilities.name: Solar Bind
abilities.description: Weakens an enemy's magical resistance, and applies a slow that increases in strength the more the target moves.

abilities.name: Spirit Form
abilities.description: Ezalor temporarily turns his body luminescent, gaining bonus movement speed, cast range, grants the Blinding Light ability, and allows Illuminate to be channeled by a separate spirit and heal allies.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location.  If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted.

abilities.name: Will-O-Wisp
abilities.description: Summons Ignis Fatuus at the targeted area. Alternates on and off, drawing enemies closer with its mesmerising flicker.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.description: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Tidebringer
abilities.description: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.description: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

abilities.name: Ghostship
abilities.description: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.

abilities.name: Tidal Wave
abilities.description: Releases a Tidal Wave that spawns behind Kunkka. Deals damage and drags enemies along it for the duration. Enemies cannot attack while being dragged.

abilities.name: Torrent Storm
abilities.description: Releases a visible Torrent in a random area around Kunkka once every 0.3 for 5.0 seconds. Spawns within 1100.0 range of him.

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him debuff immune, increasing his magic resistance by 80%, and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.description: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 325.0 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dance
abilities.description: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.

abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.description:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.description: Increases movement speed during Blade Fury, and attacks random nearby enemy units with reduced damage.

abilities.name: Swiftslash
abilities.description: Performs a short Omnislash for 1.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.description: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4.0 seconds.  The primary target receives both base and area damage.

abilities.name: Frost Shield
abilities.description: Applies a magical frost shield around the target, reducing damage from attacks against it. While the shield is active, ice magic will affect nearby enemy units every 1.0 seconds, dealing minor damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Sinister Gaze
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Hypnotizes an enemy unit, causing it to move towards a point between the two of you and drains a percentage of its current mana. If cast on a creep lasts 2.0x longer and deals 250.0 damage per second.

abilities.name: Chain Frost
abilities.description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10.0 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. Each bounce increases the damage for the subsequent bounces.

abilities.name: Ice Spire
abilities.description:
Creates an Ice Spire at the target spot, slowing enemies around it. Can take 5 hero hits or 10 creep hits and when destroyed it will create a Frost Blast around it.

Chain Frost can bounce to the Spire if there are no other enemies in range.

Lich can cast Frost Shield on the Spire. Each Frost Shield tick will heal the spire by 1 hero attack.

abilities.name: Sinister Gaze
abilities.description: Sinister Gaze becomes an Area of Effect ability, affecting units within a radius of 0.0 in the target area. Sinister Gaze allows Lich to cast other abilities while channeling it.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Odds
abilities.description: Turns the enemies' numbers against them, dealing damage per unit or per hero and granting you bonus attack speed . Deals bonus damage to illusions and summoned units as a percent of their current health. Can be cast during Duel.

abilities.name: Press The Attack
abilities.description:
Removes debuffs and disables from the target friendly unit, and grants bonus movement speed and health regen for a short time.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Moment of Courage
abilities.description: When attacked, Legion Commander has a chance to immediately counterattack with bonus lifesteal.

abilities.name: Duel
abilities.description: Legion Commander and the target enemy hero are forced to attack each other for a short duration.  Neither hero can use items or abilities. If either hero dies during the duration, the hero winning the Duel gains permanent bonus damage.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Odds
abilities.description: Overwhelming Odds now grants armor for every unit hit and has increased duration.

abilities.name: Duel
abilities.description: Increases Duel duration and reduces cooldown.  Legion Commander and her opponent take reduced damage from other sources.

abilities.name: Split Earth
abilities.description: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

abilities.name: Diabolic Edict
abilities.description: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal pure damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take. Lasts 10.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.description: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.

abilities.name: Pulse Nova
abilities.description: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units. Drains Leshrac's mana with each pulse.

abilities.name: Split Earth
abilities.description: Causes Split Earth to repeat in the same location 3.0 additional times, with a 5.0 second delay between each one. Each time the radius increases by 60.0. Split Earth echo location is visible to both teams.

abilities.name: Nihilism
abilities.description: Causes Leshrac and all nearby enemies to turn ethereal, preventing them from attacking, slowing them, and making them take more magic damage. Increases Leshrac's speed rather than reducing it. Does not cause Leshrac to take amplified damage.

abilities.name: Earth Spike
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.description: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage and grows stronger with each life it consumes.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.description: Causes Mana Drain to affect up to 2.0 additional enemies and gets +400.0 additional break distance. Lion becomes Debuff Immune with 50% magic resistance while channeling.

abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.description: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description:
Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Debuff Immune, increasing magic resistance by 80%, and gaining increased movement speed.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.description: Lifestealer's attacks deal damage and provide heal for a percentage of his target's max health.

abilities.name: Ghoul Frenzy
abilities.description: Passively causes Lifestealer's attacks to significantly slow enemy movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Grants you Attack Speed.

abilities.name: Infest
abilities.description:
Lifestealer infests the body of a target unit, becoming undetectable, and healing for a portion of his max hitpoints every second while inside. He can then explode from the host body, dealing damage to nearby enemies. If the infested unit is an enemy creep or a neutral creep, he can take control of the unit's ability to move and attack. Does not work on enemy heroes.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.description: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration. Deals 2% of the target's max health per attack on the target from real heroes. After receiving 500.0 damage, the Open Wounds fester and spread to a non-infected random enemy within 700.0 radius.

abilities.name: Infest
abilities.description: Increases cast range and reduces cooldown to %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s.  Infest may target enemy heroes for a short duration, disarming them and attacking them from the inside while increasing Lifestealer's regeneration rate.

abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.description: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.description: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul
abilities.description: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina hits an enemy with a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 18.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.description: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul
