abilities.description: Lina's abilities deal %shard_bonus_spell_damage% more damage for each Fiery Soul Charge.

abilities.name: Flame Cloak
abilities.description: Grants Lina unobstructed movement and increases her spell damage and magic resistance. Grants max fiery soul stacks on activation.

abilities.name: Summon Wolves
abilities.description: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Permanent Invisibility, and level 4 wolves have Cripple that gives 20% chance to cripple the target, causing 8 damage per second and lose 60 attack speed for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Howl
abilities.description: Strikes fear into enemies, reducing armor and attack damage of all enemies within 2000.0 range of Lycan and his wolves. Non-hero controlled units flee for a short time. At night Howl's armor and attack damage reductions are global.

abilities.name: Feral Impulse
abilities.description: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a 40.0% chance to deal a critical strike doing 160.0% damage.

abilities.name: Summon Wolves
abilities.description: Causes one of your creep waves to include one uncontrollable wolf that moves with the wave. Additionally, wolves spawned this way may Cripple towers.

abilities.name: Wolf Bite
abilities.description: Lycan bites an ally, granting them Shapeshift properties. Lycan and the bitten target gain 30.0% Lifesteal and share the healing effect of Lifesteal with each other as long as they are within 1200.0 range of each other.

abilities.name: Summon Spirit Bear
abilities.description:
Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items. If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack. Lone Druid suffers 20.0% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.

Spirit Bear has the Return, Demolish and Entangling Claws abilities.

abilities.name: Spirit Link
abilities.description: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, sharing a percentage of their armor with each other, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.

abilities.name: Savage Roar
abilities.description: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20.0%.

abilities.name: True Form
abilities.description: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage, but gaining increased bonus armor and health, and improved versions of Entangling Claws and Demolish.

abilities.name: Savage Roar
abilities.description:
Applies a basic dispel and grants allies in an area around the caster bonus movement and attack speed. Replicates between Lone Druid and Spirit Bear regardless of castability on the other.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Summon Spirit Bear
abilities.description: Allows Spirit Bear to attack at any range from Lone Druid, and to survive if Lone Druid dies.

abilities.name: Lucent Beam
abilities.description: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

abilities.name: Moon Glaives
abilities.description: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

abilities.name: Lunar Blessing
abilities.description: Increases the attack damage for Luna and nearby allied heroes, with Luna receiving 200.0% of the attack damage bonus allies receive. At night Lunar Blessing is global, and Luna is blessed with increased vision range.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Showers random nearby enemies with strikes from Luna's current level of Lucent Beam. These beams do not stun their targets, and there is a maximum number of times that a single target can be struck. Also turns day into night for a short time.

abilities.name: Lucent Beam
abilities.description: Every time an enemy hero is hit by a Lucent Beam, Luna's attack damage is increased by 0.0 for 0.0s.

abilities.name: Eclipse
abilities.description: Allows Luna to cast Eclipse on an allied unit or herself and have its effects follow them, or cast it on an area. Also increases total beams, reduces duration, removes the limit on beams per unit, and makes the beams appear twice as fast.

abilities.name: Spear of Mars
abilities.description: Mars throws his legendary Spear with deadly precision, damaging each enemy unit it strikes. The first enemy hero it hits is skewered on the spear, pushing it back. If a skewered hero hits a tree, building, or cliff, they will be impaled to it and stunned.

abilities.name: God's Rebuke
abilities.description: Mars smashes enemies in front of him with his shield, knocking them back and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Bonus damage is added when hitting heroes. Has True Strike.

abilities.name: Bulwark
abilities.description:
Mars wields his massive shield to block a portion of each physical attack when hit from the front or sides.

Can be toggled, removing Mars's ability to attack, and locking the direction he is facing. When active, reduces movement speed and re-directs 70.0% of the attack projectiles aimed at Mars's allies towards Mars instead.

abilities.name: Arena Of Blood
abilities.description: After a short formation time, Mars summons an arena lined with the undead warriors of the Ash Legion, who block enemy attacks and movement. Enemy heroes near the inside edge of the arena will be attacked by spears, dealing damage and knocking them back.

abilities.name: Spear of Mars
abilities.description: Spear of Mars impales up to two units and leaves a fire trail behind that deals damage over time and slows movement speed.

abilities.name: Bulwark
abilities.description: Creates invulnerable soldiers around Mars' front while Bulwark is toggled on. Soldiers move alongside Mars, dealing his attacks that have bonus damage and slow enemies. An enemy can only be attacked by one soldier at a time.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line, pulling them towards him and slowing them for a brief period.

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.description: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack. Magnus receives 75.0% larger bonus.

abilities.name: Skewer
abilities.description: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk. Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and affected by slowed movement and attack speed.

abilities.name: Reverse Polarity
abilities.description: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Increases range, and causes Shockwave to return towards the caster's original cast location after reaching max length, hitting enemies a second time for 0.0% of the damage.

abilities.name: Horn Toss
abilities.description: Magnus tosses any enemies in front of him, launching them to his rear. Enemies take damage, spend 0.6 seconds in the air, and then are stunned upon landing.

abilities.name: Dispose
abilities.description: Marci grabs an allied or enemy target and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Any enemy units in the landing area will also be damaged and slowed.

abilities.name: Rebound
abilities.description:
Marci bounds to the targeted allied unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Upon reaching the unit, Marci lunges to her final destination, damaging and stunning enemies where she lands.

The ally receives 25.0% bonus movement speed for 5.0s.

abilities.name: Sidekick
abilities.description: Marci's loyalty helps ensure survival, imbuing a chosen allied hero and herself with lifesteal and attack damage.

abilities.name: Unleash
abilities.description:
Marci taps a hidden power, gaining Fury charges that allow her to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes that slow movement and attack speed of the target for 2.0s. The last strike in every Fury combo creates a damaging pulse around the target. In between Fury combos, Marci is unable to attack for 1.5s.

Marci gains 15.0% movement speed when Unleash is cast.

abilities.name: Rebound
abilities.description: Rebound can be cast on enemies and causes Marci to also get the speed boost when she casts it.

abilities.name: Unleash
abilities.description:
Reduces Unleash cooldown by 20.0 seconds and causes Unleash to apply a basic dispel on Marci. While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast. All of Marci's unleash pulses will silence units for 0.0 seconds.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.description: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 650.0 radius will be struck a second time for 75.0% of the damage.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.0 to 3.2 seconds, with bonus damage up to 180.0 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 4.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.description: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.description:
Upon landing, launches a projectile along Sagan's leap path, dealing damage and slowing units affected. Leap does not break Moonlight Shadow invisibility.

Can be put on autocast to choose the distance and facing direction of the jump.

Grants 1.0 bonus charge(s).

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.description: Causes Sacred Arrow to release a Starstorm on enemies along the travel path of the primary arrow, releasing a second Starstorm that deals less damage to the impacted unit.

abilities.name: Split Shot
abilities.description:
Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.

The extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike).

abilities.name: Mystic Snake
abilities.description: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage. Damage and speed increases with each jump. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake returns 16.0% mana based on the targets' total mana.

abilities.name: Mana Shield
abilities.description: Creates a shield that absorbs 98.0% of incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana. Provides bonus mana capacity.

abilities.name: Stone Gaze
abilities.description: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2.0 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, and take bonus physical attack damage.

abilities.name: Cold Blooded
abilities.description: When Medusa is targeted with a spell, a single-target Mystic Snake is sent back towards the enemy.

abilities.name: Mystic Snake
abilities.description: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies hit into stone. Stone duration increases with each bounce of the Mystic Snake.

abilities.name: Earthbind
abilities.description: Tosses a net at the target point, rooting down all enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: Poof
abilities.description:
Drawing mystical energies from the earth, a Meepo can teleport to another Meepo or itself after channeling for 1.5 seconds, damaging the enemy in both the departure and arrival locations.

If the ability is in autocast state, all Meepos will also cast Poof to the target. When cast on the ground, all Meepos except the selected one will Poof to the closest location.

abilities.name: Ransack
abilities.description: Steals health from the enemy with each strike and heals all other Meepos for that amount.

abilities.name: Divided We Stand
abilities.description: Meepo summons an imperfect, semi-autonomous duplicate of himself, which can gain gold and experience as he does and shares his experience, attributes and abilities. However, the clones cannot wield any items but the boots that Meepo himself wears.  If any of the clones die, they all die. Divided We Stand grants all Meepos bonus Magic Resistance.

abilities.name: Dig
abilities.description:
Digs into the ground for a short duration, dispelling Meepo and causing him to become invulnerable and untargetable for 3.0s. Restores 35.0% of his max health over that duration.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: MegaMeepo
abilities.description:
Primary Meepo mounts all other Meepos in a 600.0 radius around him on top of his shoulders. While in this form, he gains 50.0% of the other Meepo stats and can Fling them at enemies, dealing damage and slowing them.

When cast, Earthbind generates additional nets and Poof deals bonus damage based on the amount of Meepos riding on top.

abilities.name: Dead Shot
abilities.description:
Muerta fires a ghostly trickshot at an enemy unit or tree. When the bullet strikes, it damages and briefly slows, then ricochets in the targeted direction.

The ricochet damages all units that it passes through, stopping when it hits a hero. Heroes hit by the ricochet are feared away from the impact.

abilities.name: The Calling
abilities.description: Summons a group of 4.0 revenants that slowly circle the targeted location. Enemies within the area are slowed and have reduced attack speed. Revenants deal damage and silence enemies as they pass through them.

abilities.name: Gunslinger
abilities.description: Muerta's attacks have a chance to fire a second shot at another target, prioritizing Heroes.

abilities.name: Pierce the Veil
abilities.description:
Muerta transforms, becoming immune to physical damage. All of her attack damage is dealt as magical damage. Muerta gains bonus attack damage and phased movement.

Muerta can attack ethereal units, but deals no damage to Magic Immune targets.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Pierce the Veil
abilities.description:
Muerta gains 30.0% Spell Lifesteal during Pierce the Veil.

While Pierce the Veil is active Muerta permanently gains 2.0% spell amplification each time she kills an enemy Hero or they die in her vicinity.

abilities.name: Parting Shot
abilities.description:
Muerta precisely shoots a hero in their soul, separating it from their physical body and knocking it 150.0 units away.

The soul is untargetable, muted, disarmed, and invulnerable for 4.0 seconds.

The body is stunned and has 50.0% damage reduction for this duration.

After the effect ends the hero's soul is forcefully returned to their body applying a strong dispel. The soul will survive until the end of the effect even if the hero is killed.

abilities.name: Boundless Strike
abilities.description: Monkey King enlarges his staff and slams it against the ground, stunning enemies in a line and damaging them with a critical hit based on his attack. Has True Strike.

abilities.name: Tree Dance
abilities.description: Monkey King jumps to a tree and perches atop it. While perched, he gains the Primal Spring ability-a channeled leap attack. If Monkey King's tree is destroyed, he falls and is stunned for 4 seconds. Taking damage from player controlled units or Roshan while on the ground puts Tree Dance on cooldown.

abilities.name: Jingu Mastery
abilities.description: Monkey King's attacks awaken the Jingu Bang's power. Upon the fourth hit on the same enemy hero, Monkey King earns four charged attacks that have bonus damage and lifesteal.

abilities.name: Wukong's Command
abilities.description: Monkey King creates a circular formation of soldiers that spread out from his position. If Monkey King leaves the area his soldiers disperse. The soldiers have Monkey King's attack and only target heroes. Monkey King is granted bonus armor for the spell's duration.

abilities.name: Boundless Strike
abilities.description: When Boundless Strike is set to autocast, Monkey King leaps to the end of his staff as soon as Boundless Strike hits the ground.

abilities.name: Wukong's Command
abilities.description: Spawns a monkey soldier near Monkey King at regular intervals. Soldiers do not spawn while invisible or on trees. Soldiers only attack buildings when Monkey King himself is nearby. Soldiers can now gain Jingu Mastery charges independently.

abilities.name: Waveform
abilities.description: Morphling dissolves into liquid and surges forward, damaging enemy units in his path.  Morphling is invulnerable during Waveform.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
abilities.description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, dealing base damage plus additional damage based on Morphling's agility times a multiplier. If Morphling's agility is 50% higher than strength, the maximum agility multiplier is used. Passively grants bonus Agility.

Also puts Adaptive Strike (Strength) on a 3.0 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Strength)
abilities.description:
Launches a surge of water toward an enemy unit, stunning and knocking back the target based on Morphling's strength. If his strength is 50% higher than his agility, the maximum stun/knockback is dealt. Passively grants bonus Strength.

Also puts Adaptive Strike (Agility) on a 3.0 second cooldown.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Agility Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Strength and pouring them into Agility. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.

abilities.name: Attribute Shift (Strength Gain)
abilities.description: Morphling shifts its form, pulling points from Agility and pouring them into Strength. The process is reversible.  Additional points in Attribute Shift increase the rate of stat change.

abilities.name: Morph
abilities.description: Morphling changes his form to match the targeted enemy, gaining their basic abilities. Can be toggled for the duration of the ability.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strike (Agility)
abilities.description: Increases bonus Agility.

abilities.name: Morph
abilities.description: Morphling steals stats from the replicated hero. If the replicated hero's primary attribute is Strength it will also steal Status Resistance, if it's Agility, it will steal Attack Speed, if it's Intelligence, it will steal Spell Amplification, and if it's Universal, it will steal additional stats.

abilities.name: Death Pulse
abilities.description: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units.

abilities.name: Ghost Shroud
abilities.description: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

abilities.name: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.description: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time. Passively provides regen for 8.0 seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

abilities.name: Reaper's Scythe
abilities.description: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. If Necrophos kills an enemy this way, he'll permanently gain Health and Mana Regen. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.

abilities.name: Death Seeker
abilities.description: Necrophos turns into a large Death Pulse towards the target unit's position. Once it arrives to the location, the Death Pulse spreads towards nearby enemies and allies.

abilities.name: Ghost Shroud
abilities.description: Reduces Ghost Shroud cooldown.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description:
Creates multiple images of Naga Siren under her control.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.description: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

abilities.name: Rip Tide
abilities.description: Every 6.0 attacks from naga and her illusions, the Naga Siren and her images will hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 4.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.description: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.description: Increases duration. Song of the Siren heals allies by 0.0% of their Max HP per second for its duration.

abilities.name: Reel In
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Naga Siren channels for up to %AbilityChannelTime% seconds, pulling all units affected by Naga's Ensnare in a 1400.0 range towards her at a speed of 200.0.

abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.description: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place and providing vision in a 250.0 radius.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.description: Teleports to any point on the map. After teleporting, Nature's Prophet gains stacks of bonus attack damage. Every attack consumes a stack of bonus damage to increase Nature Prophet's armor.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.description: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.

abilities.name: Curse of the Oldgrowth
abilities.description: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within 1200.0 range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within 250.0 radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.description: Lowers cooldown by %bonus_AbilityCooldown%s. Entangles all enemies it hits. Duration scales from 2.0s up to 3.8s seconds at max bounce.

abilities.name: Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.description: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.description: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.

abilities.name: Multicast
abilities.description: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.

abilities.name: Dumb Luck
abilities.description: Ogre Magi's max Intelligence is 0. He receives mana and mana regeneration from Strength. Increases Multicast chance by 1% for each 20 Strength Ogre has.

abilities.name: Fire Shield
abilities.description: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next 3.0 attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.

abilities.name: Unrefined Fireblast
abilities.description: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 35.0% of Ogre Magi's current mana.

abilities.name: Void
abilities.description: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage. At night, Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities, and the slowing effect lasts longer.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.description: Night Stalker horrifies all nearby enemies, causing them to become silenced while near him.  The effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness.

abilities.name: Dark Ascension
abilities.description: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. Night Stalker gains flight and bonus damage during this time. Has unobstructed vision.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Hunter in the Night may be cast on a creep, instantly killing it and restoring some of Night Stalker's maximum health and mana. Cannot target ancients during the daytime.

abilities.name: Void
abilities.description: Void becomes an area of effect ability. Increases the mini-stun duration and leaves behind a void zone. While in the zone, all of Night Stalker's abilities are empowered with their night time effect.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units take damage, then are hurled into the air and stunned.

abilities.name: Mind Flare
abilities.description: Deals damages to the enemy equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence. Additionally deals damage equal to a percentage of damage the target received from Nyx in the past 15.0s.

abilities.name: Spiked Carapace
abilities.description:
When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.

While Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.

abilities.name: Vendetta
abilities.description: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, 50.0% of the target's max mana is removed and massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

abilities.name: Vendetta
abilities.description: Vendetta now moves faster, and a successful Vendetta attack now increases the target's spell damage taken.

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Nyx Assassin buries himself beneath the battlefield over a short duration. Once burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast, the range of Mana Burn and Impale is increased, and Impale's cooldown is decreased. While burrowed, Nyx Assassin is stationary, unable to attack, and invisible. Nyx gains damage reduction from all damage sources.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.

abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.description: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.

abilities.name: Essence Flux
abilities.description: Passively grants you a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.

abilities.name: Sanity's Eclipse
abilities.description: Unleashes a psychic blast that deals damage to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment. Deals bonus damage to illusions.

abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.description: Grants additional Mana Capacity steal to Astral Imprisonment. Also allows allies to move at 0.0% movement speed during Astral Imprisonment (they are visible, but untargettable and can't perform any other actions).

abilities.name: Essence Flux
abilities.description: Damage that brings Outworld Destroyer below 20.0% health triggers a strong dispel. In addition, when the effect is triggered Outworld Destroyer consumes of all his mana to create an all damage barrier equal to 50.0% of his maximum mana that lasts for 15.0 seconds. This effect can occur every 60.0 seconds and cannot be refreshed.

abilities.name: Purification
abilities.description: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Heavenly Grace
abilities.description: Applies a strong dispel on himself and the target ally and grants both of them bonus Strength and HP Regen based on the amount of Debuffs dispelled.

abilities.name: Hammer of Purity
abilities.description: Omniknight fires his hammer to a target to deal pure damage based on a percentage of his base damage and slows the target.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Omniknight calls upon a Guardian Angel that grants allies immunity from physical damage.

abilities.name: Hammer of Purity
abilities.description: Omniknight is healed for %bonus_heal_pct%% of the damage dealt by Hammer of Purity. Every %bonus_attack_cooldown% seconds, his next attack will fire a Hammer of Purity at the target.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Increases duration, provides Status Resist, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

abilities.name: Fortune's End
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and dispels enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only dispel debuffs. The root duration is equal to the time spent channeling.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Fate's Edict
abilities.description: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them if they are an enemy and granting them 100.0% magic damage resistance if they are an ally.

abilities.name: Purifying Flames
abilities.description: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.

abilities.name: False Promise
abilities.description:
Temporarily alters an ally's destiny, delaying any healing or damage taken until False Promise ends. Any healing that is delayed by False Promise is amplified. Removes most negative status effects and disables on initial cast.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Rain of Destiny
abilities.description: Brings forth rain to the target area. Enemies standing in the area receive damage and have reduced heal amplification. Allies in the area heal and have increased incoming heal amplification.

abilities.name: False Promise
abilities.description: Causes False Promise to have a 0.1 second fade delay invisibility and grants the ally 25.0% bonus Spell Damage and 0.3 reduced Base Attack Time.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.

abilities.name: Doppelganger
abilities.description:
Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After 1.0 second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 500.0% bonus damage and deals -80.0% less damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.description: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence on an attack, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for 8.0 seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last 4.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.description: Adds an active ability to Juxtapose. Renders Phantom Lancer invisible for up to 8.0 seconds while generating a duplicate image to confuse enemies. His movement speed is increased by 15.0% during this invisibility.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.description: Spirit Lance bounces twice on enemies, prioritizing Heroes. Increases Spirit Lance illusion damage and slow amount.

abilities.name: Swashbuckle
abilities.description:
Pangolier dashes along the target line, then slashes all enemies in the drawn direction with several quick swipes.

Lucky Shot has a chance to activate from this damage.

abilities.name: Shield Crash
abilities.description:
Pangolier jumps in the air and slams back to the ground in front of his current position, damaging and slowing all enemies in a radius. For each enemy hero hit, he gains a percentage of incoming damage reduction for a short time.

Forward movement is maintained if Shield Crash is used while Rolling Thunder is active, and allows Rolling Thunder to clear walls or cliffs.

abilities.name: Lucky Shot
abilities.description: Pangolier rolls the dice and lets fate decide the outcome for his enemies. Grants a chance to apply a Disarm and reduce armor on any damage dealt by Pangolier's attacks or abilities.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description:
Pangolier curls into a debuff immune ball with 50% additional magic resistance and rolls out. When rolling, he moves at an increased speed and can move through trees, but has a decreased ability to turn. Striking enemies knocks them back, inflicting damage and stunning them when they land.

Colliding with walls or cliffs will cause a temporary pause while Pangolier reverses in direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Roll Up
abilities.description: Pangolier curls into an immobile protective ball, gaining debuff immunity, 50% magic resistance, and allowing him to turn. Can be cast during Rolling Thunder to temporarily hit the brakes. Can cast Rolling Thunder and Shield Crash during Roll Up. If enemies attack Pangolier during this, he will roll away from the attacker, applying Rolling Thunder damage/stun if there are enemies in the way.

abilities.name: Shield Crash
abilities.description: Causes Shield Crash to cast a 2-attack Swashbuckle every 90 degrees around your hero.

abilities.name: Stifling Dagger
abilities.description: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing 65.0+25.0% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.

abilities.name: Phantom Strike
abilities.description: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed and lifesteal while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description:
Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks. Can be activated to blur her body, causing her to be impossible to see until near enemy heroes, towers, or outposts.

Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

abilities.name: Coup de Grace
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

abilities.name: Fan of Knives
abilities.description: Phantom Assassin releases sharp blades around her, dealing a percentage of each victim's max health on impact and applying Break.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.description: Causes Blur to have instant cast time and applies a dispel. Any time Phantom Assassin gets a hero kill, her abilities are refreshed. Reduces cooldown and increases Vanish Buffer.

abilities.name: Illusory Orb
abilities.description: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.description: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.description: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range + 200.0 every time it phase shifts.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.description: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked every 0.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Icarus Dive
abilities.description: Phoenix dives forward in an arc with a fixed distance in the targeted direction, dealing damage over time and slowing the movement speed of any units it comes into contact with, and then orbiting back to its original position. If Phoenix casts Supernova, the dive ends.

abilities.name: Fire Spirits
abilities.description: Summons 4 fire spirits that circle around Phoenix. Each spirit can be launched independently at a targeted area of effect. Affected enemy units take damage over time and have their attack speed greatly reduced.

abilities.name: Sun Ray
abilities.description: Phoenix expels a beam of light at the cost of its own health. The beam damages enemies and heals allies for a base amount plus a percentage of their health. The percentage increases as the beam continues to fire.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.description:
The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After 6.0 seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Sun Ray
abilities.description: Allows Sun Ray to be cast during Supernova, and slows affected enemies by 12.0%.

abilities.name: Supernova
abilities.description: Increases number of attacks to destroy Supernova and allows Phoenix to cast Supernova on an allied hero, bringing both into the sun to be reborn together.

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.description:
Primal Beast charges up and then runs in the chosen direction, knocking back enemies and allies alike. Enemy units are damaged and stunned on impact. The longer the charge duration, the farther Primal Beast's momentum will carry him.

Can be cancelled at any time with the Stop command.

abilities.name: Trample
abilities.description: Primal Beast stomps over everything. For every 140.0 units traveled, all enemies around the Beast receive damage. Deals base damage plus a multiplier of Primal Beast's attack damage. Primal Beast is disarmed for the duration of the ability.

abilities.name: Uproar
abilities.description:
The Beast's temper passively provides bonus damage. Additionally, for every instance of 50.0 damage or more Primal Beast takes from enemy heroes, he accumulates stacks of Uproar.

When activated, Primal Beast releases a roar that slows surrounding enemies and grants the Beast additional attack damage and armor for 7.0 seconds based on his current stacks of Uproar.

abilities.name: Pulverize
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Primal Beast channels his rage, grabbing the target enemy and slamming them into the ground repeatedly, damaging and mini-stunning any enemies caught in the AoE. Lasts 2.3 seconds.

abilities.name: Rock Throw
abilities.description: Primal Beast throws a rock at the target location that stuns and damages enemies. The rock cannot be thrown within a minimum range of Primal Beast. After landing, the throck splits into 3 additional fragments that land behind the initial target location.

abilities.name: Uproar
abilities.description: When Primal Beast activates Uproar, he releases 3.0 waves of 2.0 projectiles per stack of uproar each in a circle around him. Projectiles deal damage and Break enemies hit. After a short delay, each projectile splinters in two.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15.0 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3.0 seconds. Queen of Pain relishes in the pain inflicted, healing every time the enemy takes damage. Creeps heal for half the damage only.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Scream Of Pain
abilities.description: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.description: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake and pushing them back.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Releases a sonic boom when Queen of Pain blinks, at both her starting and ending locations. Deals 125.0 damage in a 300.0 AoE and silences the target for 1.8 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.description: Causes Shadow Strike to become a 0.0 AoE Spell, and have increased initial damage. When Shadow Strike ends or is re-applied to an enemy Hero, the target emits a Scream of Pain, hitting any nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.description: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge, killing it if it's a non-ancient creep and dealing damage if it is an enemy otherwise.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.description: Gives Pudge damage block against all sources. Passively grants bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Damage is increased by Pudge's Strength and heals him for the total amount. Pudge pulls the unit at a rate of 75.0 units, up to a minimum of 125.0 range. Lasts longer on creeps.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.description: Decreases cooldown, and allows targeting an ally with bonus cast range to swallow them and heal them for a percentage of their max health per second.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.description: Increases Rot radius and damage, and causes it to reduce enemy health regen.

abilities.name: Nether Blast
abilities.description: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.

abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.description: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Healing on affected allies is increased, while afflicted enemies take extra magic damage instead. Can be cast while channeling.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell dealing base damage plus the damage multiplier of the mana spent by the enemy hero.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.description: Increases cast range.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.description: Reduces cooldown by 7.0s. When targeting an enemy hero, Pugna reduces their outgoing spell damage by 0.0% per second up to a maximum of 0.0% and increases his own, up to a maximum of 0.0%. When draining through a Nether Ward using Shard, the rate of increase/decrease is 0.0% instead. Debuff lasts 0.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Rubick uses his telekinetic powers to lift the enemy into the air briefly and then hurls them back at the ground. The unit lands on the ground with such force that it stuns nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Fade Bolt
abilities.description: Rubick creates a powerful stream of arcane energy that travels between enemy units, dealing damage and reducing their attack damage. Each jump deals less damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Supremacy
abilities.description: Rubick's mastery of the arcane allows him to have a larger cast range and increased potency.

abilities.name: Spell Steal
abilities.description: Rubick studies the trace magical essence of one enemy hero, learning the secrets of the last spell the hero cast. Rubick can use this spell as his own for several minutes or until he dies, and stolen spells last longer on enemies.

abilities.name: Telekinesis
abilities.description: Allows you to target yourself or allies with Telekinesis. Throw range is 85.0% longer and throw delay is reduced to 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Spell Steal
abilities.description: Increases the number of spells that can be stolen to 2. Increases cast range, and upgrades spells to their Scepter version.

abilities.name: Plasma Field
abilities.description: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, slowing and dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage and slow increases with distance from Razor. The Plasma Field hits each unit twice, once each direction.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.description: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor. Allows Razor to attack while moving with the link active.

abilities.name: Storm Surge
abilities.description: Passively increases Razor's movement speed.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

abilities.name: Storm Surge
abilities.description: Causes Storm Surge to have a chance when attacked, and always when targeted with a spell, to release forked lightning that strikes the target and other nearby enemies, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: Causes Eye of the Storm to strike two different units instead of one and can damage structures. When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss attacks.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.description: Teleports behind the target unit, momentarily slowing them and striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Riki phases out of the world while striking random enemy units from behind in an area around him.

abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.description: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. Bonus damage is doubled against non-hero units. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible. Grants bonus experience for hero kills and assists.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Enemies caught in the smoke screen have their armor reduced by 0.0 and cannot be targeted by their allies.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.description: Increases cast range, number of attacks and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.  Each attack hits an additional target.

abilities.name: Shadowraze
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend razes the ground directly in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in the area. Adds a stacking damage amplifier on the target that causes the enemy to take bonus Shadowraze damage per stack. Each consecutive stack also decreases movement speed.

abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. On death, he releases 40% of them from bondage.

abilities.name: Presence of the Dark Lord
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies. Every enemy hero killed nearby further improves armor reduction by 2.0 for 20.0s.

abilities.name: Requiem of Souls
abilities.description:
Shadow Fiend gathers his captured souls to release them as lines of demonic energy. Units near Shadow Fiend when the souls are released can be damaged by several lines of energy. Any unit damaged by Requiem of Souls will be feared and have its movement speed and magic resistance reduced for 0.7 seconds for each line hit up to a maximum of 2.1. Lines of energy are created for every soul captured through Necromastery.

Requiem of Souls is automatically cast whenever Shadow Fiend dies, regardless of its cooldown.

abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.description: Shadow Fiend gains an extra soul per kill. Shadow Fiend can consume a soul per attack to deal critical damage and fear the target.

abilities.name: Necromastery
abilities.description: Increases max souls.

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.description: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The effect ends when Sand King leaves the area.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.description: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to move more slowly and to violently explode when it dies.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: After a cast point of 2.0 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.description: Increases Epicenter Pulse damage, and every 700.0 units moved causes a small single Epicenter Pulse around Sand King.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.description: Every 0.2s, 0.0 Burrowstrike spines are created at random locations, each having a 0.0 radius, that apply Burrowstrike damage and stun to enemies hit.

abilities.name: Disruption
abilities.description: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

abilities.name: Disseminate
abilities.description: Whenever the target takes damage, all enemies, including the target itself if it is an enemy, within 675.0 range of the target also receive a portion of that damage. Can target enemy and allied units. Effect is paused if the target is hidden by Disruption.

abilities.name: Shadow Poison
abilities.description: Deals damage in a line, and afflicts enemy units with a poison effect. The poison deals 1/2/4/8/16 times the stack damage based on the number of stacks on the target, up to 5.0 stacks. Additional stacks cause 50.0 damage each.  This deferred damage is dealt when Shadow Poison's duration is expired, or the Release sub-ability is used.

abilities.name: Demonic Purge
abilities.description:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration. The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Demonic Cleanse
abilities.description:
Cleanses the target allied unit, removing negative buffs for the duration. At the end of the duration, the unit is healed. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Cleanse.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Demonic Cleanse
abilities.description: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 2.0 charges that replenish every 60.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence. Upon impact, leaves a debuff that increases Skywrath Mage's spell lifesteal against the target.

abilities.name: Concussive Shot
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage sets off a long range shot that hits the closest hero within a long range.  Upon impact, it deals damage and slows in an area of effect. Deals 75.0% damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Ancient Seal
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

abilities.name: Mystic Flare
abilities.description: Skywrath Mage uses his ultimate magical ability to conjure a precise and violent mystical field that lays waste to his adversaries. Deals massive damage distributed evenly among any Heroes in the area over 2.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Shield of the Scion
abilities.description: Every time Skywrath Mage deals magic damage to an enemy hero with an ability, he gains a buff that grants bonus Intelligence and Armor. Each charge stacks independently.

abilities.name: Arcane Bolt
abilities.description: When Skywrath Mage casts Arcane Bolt, a different random target within 700.0 range willl be hit with the same ability. Heroes will take priority.

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.description: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.description: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, absorbing their life energy over time.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Summons 10.0 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.description: Shackles creates 4.0 Serpent Wards attacking the target. Increases Shackles cast range by 75.0. Serpent wards lasts 7.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.description: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage.

abilities.name: Arcane Curse
abilities.description: Curses the target area, dealing damage and causing enemy heroes to take damage over time and slowing their movement speed. Silenced enemies take 1.5x slow and damage. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased. The duration is paused as long as the target is silenced.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence. Silencer temporarily steals his target's Intelligence with each hit. If Silencer kills an enemy hero, he permanently steals 2.0 Intelligence.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.description: Enchants a target, providing vision of them and causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires. Deals extra damage based on the difference in intelligence between Silencer and the target.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.description: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.description: Every 0.0 attacks, Glaives silence the enemy hit for 0.0 seconds. Additionally, it increases the Intelligence stolen per attack by 2 and per kill to 2.0.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.description: Causes Last Word to become an AoE ability.

abilities.name: Scatterblast
abilities.description: Snapfire unloads with a wide blast that damages and slows enemies in a cone. Enemies caught at point-blank range take an extra 50.0% damage.

abilities.name: Firesnap Cookie
abilities.description: Snapfire feeds a potent cookie to Mortimer or an ally, causing them to hop a short distance. The hopping unit stuns and damages enemies in the landing zone.

abilities.name: Lil' Shredder
abilities.description: Snapfire heats up her mounted turret to rapidly fire 6.0 fixed-damage attacks. Each attack reduces the enemy's armor. Provides bonus attack range for the duration.

abilities.name: Mortimer Kisses
abilities.description: Snapfire's friend launches a barrage of firespit globs over 5.5 seconds. Globs cause impact damage and create pools of firespit, which slow and apply damage over time. Snapfire has a reduced turn rate for the duration and a minimum launch range of 600.0. Each glob can be targeted with a right click.

abilities.name: Firesnap Cookie
abilities.description: Firesnap cookies become even more potent, getting increased jump range and launching a Mortimer Kiss that does 50.0% impact damage to the landing destination.

abilities.name: Gobble Up
abilities.description: Mortimer gobbles up a creep or an allied hero, which he can then spit towards enemies. The unit stays in his belly up to 3.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Guardian Sprint
abilities.description: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units. Slardar gains bonus movement speed, health regeneration and armor while in a puddle or river.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Slams the ground, leaving a puddle of water, and stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: Bash of the Deep
abilities.description: After 3.0 attacks, your next attack will bash the target. Deals double damage against creeps.

abilities.name: Corrosive Haze
abilities.description: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight and vision of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility. The enemy unit leaves a trail of water behind it for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.description: Increases Slithereen Crush radius, and causes it to apply Corrosive Haze for a short time to units affected.

abilities.name: Guardian Sprint
abilities.description: Provides additional HP Regen, Armor and Status Resistance while in a puddle or in the river.

abilities.name: Dark Pact
abilities.description:
After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself. Slark only takes 30.0% of the damage.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Slark leaps forward, leashing the first hero he connects with and applying Essence Shift Stacks.  That unit can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

abilities.name: Essence Shift
abilities.description: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility. If Slark kills an affected enemy hero, he permanently steals 1.0 Agility.

abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.description: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.

abilities.name: Depth Shroud
abilities.description: Creates a cloud at the target location. All allies inside the radius are hidden and affected by Shadow Dance.

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.description: Provides charges and increases range.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

abilities.name: Bulldoze
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker gains movement speed and status resistance to ram through enemies. Can be used while charging.

abilities.name: Greater Bash
abilities.description: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage. Deals 1.5x damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Nether Strike
abilities.description: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage. Knocks back for double the normal distance.

abilities.name: Planar Pocket
abilities.description: Barathrum distorts the fabric of planar space, increasing his own magic resistance and redirecting the first targeted enemy hero spell in a radius towards him. Effect ends when the first spell is redirected.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.description: Reduces Charge of Darkness cooldown and makes it pierce magic immunity.

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.description: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every 35.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.description: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and knock back his enemies. Headshots briefly slow enemy movement and attack speed by -100.0%.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.description: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle. Can be activated to provide 100.0% Headshot chance. Slows you by 45.0% for the duration.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after a short aiming duration, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range and mini-stuns the target.

abilities.name: Concussive Grenade
abilities.description: Launches a grenade at the target area, dealing damage to enemies and knocking them and Sniper himself back. Enemies affected are disarmed and have their movement slowed after the knockback.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.description: Causes Assassinate to fire quicker and stun the enemy target.

abilities.name: Spectral Dagger
abilities.description: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain. Spectral Dagger applies an instance of Desolate to targets with no allied units within 400 radius of them.

abilities.name: Desolate
abilities.description: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy that does not have any allied units within a 400.0 radius around them.

abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.description: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description:
Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.

Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself. They ignore terrain.

abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.description: Dispersion can be activated to increase damage reflected by 0.0% for 0.0s. Cooldown 0.0. Manacost 0.0.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Allows Spectre to perform a single target Haunt on a visible enemy. Casts a Spectral Dagger on the target.

abilities.name: Sticky Bomb
abilities.description: Lobs a Sticky Bomb towards the target area. If it lands next to an enemy hero, the bomb will stick to it, slowing its movement speed. After a few seconds the bomb will explode, dealing damage in an area around the detonation and applying a secondary slow for 3.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Reactive Tazer
abilities.description: Techies trigger an electric charge giving them bonus movement speed for a short period of time. Enemies attacking Techies are temporarily disarmed and get a Basic Dispel. At the end of the effect, the charge explodes, disarming all enemies within the radius.

abilities.name: Blast Off!
abilities.description: Techies hurtle themselves into the enemy's midst, detonating charges upon impact which deal massive area of effect damage and stun enemies. Upon landing, the assault deals Techies non-lethal damage equal to a percentage of their current health.

abilities.name: Minefield Sign
abilities.description: Plant a warning sign, causing mines within it's radius to be invulnerable. Only one sign can exist at a time. Lasts 60.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Proximity Mines
abilities.description: Plant an invisible mine that cannot be detected by True Sight, but is visible if an enemy is within the active 500.0 AoE of the mine. Mines detonate if an enemy is standing within the active AoE for 1.0 seconds dealing damage and temporarily reducing the enemy's Magic Resistance. The explosion deals full damage if the target is within 150.0 radius and decreases up to 50.0% on the edge. Deals 30.0% damage to buildings.

abilities.name: Reactive Tazer
abilities.description: Reactive Tazer can be cast on allies and deals damage on detonation. Also deals damage to any enemy that attacks the affected ally.

abilities.name: Minefield Sign
abilities.description: Increases radius and duration of Minefield Sign. When an enemy hero walks within 200.0 units of a minefield sign, the 500.0 units area around the sign will become a minefield for 10.0 seconds, dealing damage to enemy units any time they move within its area. Minefield Sign is destroyed after this effect ends.

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.description: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12.0 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on Storm's next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.description: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 25.0+7.5% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 10.0+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.description: Can be activated to grant Storm Spirit and nearby allied heroes 3.0 Overload charges. Provides bonus Attack Speed. Lasts up to 12.0 seconds or until the charges are depleted.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.description: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.description: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack. Passively grants bonus Strength.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Sven's Warcry heartens his allied heroes for battle, increasing their armor and movement speed. Lasts 10.0 seconds.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.description: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 35.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.description: Warcry is now undispellable and passively grants armor to all allies near Sven.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.description: Increases cast range and transports Sven along the Storm Hammer. Storm Hammer also applies a basic dispel on the target. Can be cast on invulnerable targets. If autocast on the ability is enabled, Sven does not travel with the Storm Hammer.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Tendrils of the Deep
abilities.description: Tidehunter unleashes a targeted slew of tentacles that damage and stun enemies within reach. The tentacles deal 50.0% of Ravage's damage and stun, with a range 75.0% of Ravage's radius.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Refraction
abilities.description: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

abilities.name: Meld
abilities.description: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for 12.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Psi Blades
abilities.description: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range. For each unit it damages, the spill damage is reduced by a percentage.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30.0% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 60.0% after 3.5 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

abilities.name: Psionic Trap
abilities.description: Increases max trap count and trap vision range.  When activated, traps now silence affected enemies.

abilities.name: Psionic Projection
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Allows Templar Assassin to teleport to any Psionic Trap after channeling for 1.5 seconds, detonating it upon arrival. Channeling Psionic Projection does not break Meld.

abilities.name: Reflection
abilities.description: Terrorblade brings forth an invulnerable dark reflection of all enemy heroes in a target area. Affected enemy heroes have movement and attack speeds slowed and attacked by their reflection.

abilities.name: Conjure Image
abilities.description: Creates an illusion of Terrorblade that deals damage.

abilities.name: Metamorphosis
abilities.description: Terrorblade transforms into a powerful demon with a ranged attack. Any of Terrorblade's illusions that are within 1200.0 range will also be transformed by Metamorphosis.

abilities.name: Sunder
abilities.description: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

abilities.name: Demon Zeal
abilities.description:
Costs part of Terrorblade's current HP to cast, dispelling Terrorblade and providing bonus movement and attack speed. The bonuses are stronger out of Metamorphosis.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Terror Wave
abilities.description: Causes a wave to travel outwards in all directions forcing enemy heroes to become Feared upon impact, and grants Terrorblade Metamorphosis for a short time.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.description: Bombards an area with rocks, continously doing small intervals of damage and stun to enemy units. Avalanche does 2.0x damage to units being tossed.

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.description: Grabs the nearest unit in a 300.0 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.

abilities.name: Tree Grab
abilities.description: Grabs a tree to whack enemies on the head for a limited number of attacks. Grants bonus attack range. Attacks deal more damage and fully splash on units along the way. The tree can be thrown, to deal your attack to a unit at a distance.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.description: Tiny gains craggy mass, increasing his attack damage, and armor, and toss power while slowing his attack speed.

abilities.name: Tree Throw
abilities.description: Throws the tree at the target unit, proccing your attack on it and splashing damage around the target.

abilities.name: Tree Grab
abilities.description: Causes Tree Grab to have no charge limit.

abilities.name: Tree Volley
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Tiny channels to throw random trees within range towards the targeted area. Deals Tiny's attack damage to enemies in that area with each tree thrown.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
abilities.description: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal bonus damage per tree destroyed.

abilities.name: Timber Chain
abilities.description: Timbersaw fires a chain that embeds itself in the first tree it hits, pulling him towards it.  Any enemy in the path takes damage.

abilities.name: Reactive Armor
abilities.description: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor. Heroes grant double the amount.

abilities.name: Second Chakram
abilities.description: Launches a second independent Chakram.

abilities.name: Chakram
abilities.description: Fires Timbersaw's main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5.0% of health missing. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and Timbersaw loses the ability to attack.

abilities.name: Flamethrower
abilities.description: Releases a flame in the direction Timbersaw is facing. Applies a debuff that deals damage per second and slows enemy movement speed. Affects buildings for reduced damage.

abilities.name: Reactive Armor
abilities.description: Reactive Armor can now be activated to get max stacks and 200.0 damage barrier. Grants Timbersaw 100.0 + 75.0 barrier amount per second for each enemy hero within 600.0 radius of Timbersaw up to a maximum of 800.0. After 8.0 seconds, Timbersaw deals damage to every hero within 600.0 radius equal to 200.0 + his remaining barrier amount and loses all of his barrier.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage to the target and all enemy units around it. The main target is blinded, causing them to miss all physical attacks.

abilities.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
abilities.description: Launches rockets at the nearest visible heroes within 2000.0 range.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: Targets an allied unit, applying an all damage barrier to them that also provides Status Resistance.

abilities.name: Keen Conveyance
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Teleport to a target friendly structure. Level 2 allows teleporting to friendly units and Level 3 to friendly heroes.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

abilities.name: Warp Flare
abilities.description: Throws a flare towards an enemy, dealing damage, teleporting them away and reducing their Cast and Attack Range for 3.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.description: Upgrades Tinker's Laser into a Shrink Ray, granting +200.0 cast range and reducing the main target's size, current health, and maximum health by 10.0% (stacking) if it's a hero. The laser bounces once on the farthest target up to 700.0 range from the primary one, prioritizing heroes.

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Tusk compresses shards of ice into a ball of frozen energy that damages all enemies it comes in contact with. When the ball reaches its target destination the shards are released, creating a barrier that lasts for 4.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Snowball
abilities.description: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350.0 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

abilities.name: Tag Team
abilities.description: Temporarily applies a negative debuff aura around you, causing enemies that are attacked under it to take bonus physical damage and reduced movement speed. Lasts 5.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Frozen Sigil
abilities.description: Summons a flying Sigil that slows movement speed by -40% for enemies within 650 radius. Lasts 25 seconds. Cooldown: 30

abilities.name: Walrus PUNCH!
abilities.description: Tusk connects with his mighty Walrus Punch, a critical strike so powerful it launches its victim into the air. The victim is slowed upon landing.

abilities.name: Ice Shards
abilities.description: Increases depth of Ice Shards, and enemies trapped within an ice shard are slowed and take damage per second.

abilities.name: Walrus Kick
abilities.description: Kicks the closest enemy unit in the drawn direction, stunning, damaging, and slowing them. Also deals damage to all heroes within 250.0 radius of its landing area. Cooldown is reduced by 50.0% if kicking a creep.

abilities.name: Nature's Grasp
abilities.description: Creates vines towards the target location. Vines slow down and deal damage to enemies that walk through. Vines deal 50% more damage if they touch a tree. Does half damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Leech Seed
abilities.description: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.description: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which heals the target and provides bonus armor.

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.description: Provides Treant with Tree Walking whenever he hasn't taken damage for 3.0 seconds. While active, Treant gains bonus movement speed.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.description: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that deal damage to afflicted enemies and prevent them from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
