abilities.description: Causes Treant to move faster and become invisible with Nature's Guise and root enemies upon attacking. Deals damage over time and roots for longer if the attack was near a tree.

abilities.name: Eyes In The Forest
abilities.description: Treant Protector enchants a tree, which grants him unobstructed vision in that location. If Overgrowth is cast, units within a radius of an enchanted tree will be entangled and damaged. Passively causes all trees to respawn much faster.

abilities.name: Berserker's Rage
abilities.description:
While active, Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells. Berserker's Rage also grants additional movement speed, armor, and decreases base attack time.

Whirling Axes has different functionality while Berserker's Rage is active.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.description: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over 950.0 range, slowing and damaging enemy units.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Melee)
abilities.description: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.

abilities.name: Fervor
abilities.description: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

abilities.name: Battle Trance
abilities.description:
Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within 900.0 range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Grants all allied Heroes globally a bonus based on whichever stance Troll Warlord is currently in. Ranged provides bonus Attack Speed and melee provides Status Resistance.

abilities.name: Whirling Axes (Ranged)
abilities.description:
Causes Whirling Axes (Ranged) to dispel enemies. Reduces cooldown and mana cost.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Ursa leaps forward 250.0 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 8.0 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description:
Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.description: Earthshock applies a 1.5 second Enrage on Ursa when cast.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.description: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

abilities.name: Firestorm
abilities.description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

abilities.name: Pit of Malice
abilities.description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected every 3.6 seconds.

abilities.name: Atrophy Aura
abilities.description: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If an enemy dies while under this effect, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.

abilities.name: Fiend's Gate
abilities.description: Opens 2 portals, one next to Underlord and one in the target location. Heroes can channel a portal for 3 seconds to teleport to the other side. Allies that pass through the portal temporarily gain Damage Reduction and Movement Speed. Portals have to be at least 2000.0 away from each other.

abilities.name: Firestorm
abilities.description: Firestorm can be self-targeted. When used that way, the Firestorm follows Underlord around.  The wave count is increased, and tick rate / duration time occur more quickly.

abilities.name: Pit of Malice
abilities.description: Slows enemy movement speed in the Pit of Malice.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Deals 2.0x damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.description: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

abilities.name: Flesh Golem
abilities.description: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem. Gains a percentage increase to strength and imbues attacks with a slow and damage amplification.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.description: Allows up to 1 allied hero to bunker inside of the tombstone. Heroes that enter the Tombstone cannot leave for 3.0 seconds nor can they re-enter after leaving for the same period of time. Adds an ability on the Tombstone and Undying to manually bunker heroes.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.description: Increases strength steal.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that applies a stacking movement speed slow and magic resistance deduction while dealing damage over time. Stacks up to 5.0 times.

abilities.name: Nethertoxin
abilities.description: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take an increasing damage over time based on how long they remain in it. Disables passives of affected units.

abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.description: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400.0 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

abilities.name: Viper Strike
abilities.description: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.description: Increases max stacks, and causes Poison Attack to lower armor per stack and to affect buildings for reduced damage.

abilities.name: Nosedive
abilities.description: Viper slams into the ground, disarming each enemy in a 500.0 AoE for 4.0 seconds and splattering everyone in a 1200.0 AoE with the effect of Corrosive Skin.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Wave of Terror
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the damage of nearby friendly heroes.

abilities.name: Nether Swap
abilities.description: Instantaneously swaps positions with a target Hero, friend or enemy. Nether Swap interrupts channeling abilities on the target. Enemy Swapped units take damage. Allied swapped units receive less damage for a short duration.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.description: Bounces once on an enemy, prioritizing heroes, within Magic Missile's current cast range from the first target.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.description: Upon death, creates a strong illusion of Vengeful Spirit that deals and takes full damage and can cast all of her spells. Illusion has 12.0% movement speed bonus. If the illusion is alive when Vengeful Spirit respawn, she will take its place. XP earned by her illusion is given to her. Strong Illusions are not instantly killed by spells.

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.description: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.description: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Plague Ward
abilities.description: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

abilities.name: Noxious Plague
abilities.description: Infects an enemy with a deadly plague that does an initial burst of damage and additional damage over time based on the unit's maximum health. The plague slows the target and nearby enemies based on their distance to the target. When the target dies or the debuff expires, all nearby enemies are infected with a noncommunicable version of the plague.

abilities.name: Latent Toxicity
abilities.description: Applies a weak poison that minorly slows and deals damage to its target. If this poison is dispelled in any way, the target will receive a large amount of damage and be stunned.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.description: Whenever Venomancer dies or the effects of Venomous Gale end prematurely on an enemy hero, a spreading ring of poison erupts. Enemies hit by the poison will take non-lethal magic damage over time and have their magic resistance reduced. This effect can trigger every 10.0 seconds and cannot be refreshed.

abilities.name: Fatal Bonds
abilities.description: Binds several enemy units together, causing a percentage of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

abilities.name: Shadow Word
abilities.description: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing and damaging current that grows stronger as it's channeled. Lasts up to 10.0 seconds. Enemies are slowed for 3.0 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.description: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for 0.8 seconds. The Golem lives 60.0 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: While channeling, Warlock spawns an imp every 2.0 seconds that lasts for 15.0 seconds and explode dealing damage to all enemies around them upon death.

abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.description: Calls 2.0 Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

abilities.name: Grave Chill
abilities.description: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself and nearby familiars.

abilities.name: Soul Assumption
abilities.description: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than 100.0 damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.description: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

abilities.name: Summon Familiars
abilities.description: Conjures blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.

abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.description: Grants Visage the ability to cast Gravekeeper's Cloak. Restores up to 25.0% of your health.

abilities.name: Silent as the Grave
abilities.description: Turns Visage and familiars invisible, granting Visage bonus movement speed and upgrading its movement type to flying. When Visage or its familiars leave invisibility they deal more damage for a short duration. Lasts 35.0 seconds. Invisibility ends when attacking or casting.

abilities.name: Aether Remnant
abilities.description: Void Spirit dispatches a remnant to the target location. The remnant stands watch over the region, facing the direction of his vector. When a unit crosses its gaze, the remnant pulls it in and damages it.

abilities.name: Dissimilate
abilities.description: Void Spirit temporarily fades into the aether, creating a number of portals through which he can reassemble himself. Upon exiting a portal, he damages all enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Resonant Pulse
abilities.description: Void Spirit wraps himself in a physical damage barrier and emits a single damaging pulse around him. The barrier gains increased damage absorption for each enemy hero the pulse hits.

abilities.name: Astral Step
abilities.description: Void Spirit tears a rift through the astral plane to appear at the target location, attacking all enemies along the path. This attack inflicts a void mark that slows for 1.3 seconds and then detonates.

abilities.name: Aether Remnant
abilities.description: Increases Aether Remnant watch range and only pulls enemy hero units. Other units are still damaged, but the remnant is not destroyed. Decreases cooldown to %AbilityCooldown%s.

abilities.name: Resonant Pulse
abilities.description: Causes Resonant Pulse to silence and gain 2.0 charges.

abilities.name: Arctic Burn
abilities.description: Winter Wyvern soars upon an arctic wind, granting her unobstructed movement and allowing her to exhale a blistering chill into each attack. While soaring, her attacks travel further and faster, and slow enemies with a magical freeze that strips them of 4.0% of their current health each second. Her sight is also hardened against night's chill, granting her 400.0 additional vision range at night while soaring.

abilities.name: Splinter Blast
abilities.description: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500.0 base radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 30.0%.

abilities.name: Cold Embrace
abilities.description: Encases an ally in an icy cocoon, freezing them solid while healing a base amount as well as a percentage of their maximum health each second. The cocoon blocks all physical damage.

abilities.name: Winter's Curse
abilities.description: Winter Wyvern dispells then freezes an enemy in place while striking those nearby with a maddening curse which causes them to attack their frozen ally with increased attack speed. The frozen ally and those cursed to attack their ally are immune to all damage from their enemies with the exception of Winter Wyvern or her controlled units.

abilities.name: Cold Embrace
abilities.description: When Cold Embrace ends, a Splinter Blast goes off at that location, hitting enemies within 1200.0 range. Reduces cooldown by 4.0 seconds.

abilities.name: Arctic Burn
abilities.description: Causes Arctic Burn to be a toggle ability, draining mana every second when active. Removes limit on number of attacks per target. Increases Winter Wyvern's movement speed.

abilities.name: The Swarm
abilities.description: Weaver launches a swarm of 12.0 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

abilities.name: Shukuchi
abilities.description: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining max movement speed --doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

abilities.name: Geminate Attack
abilities.description: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

abilities.name: Time Lapse
abilities.description:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Shukuchi
abilities.description: Shukuchi puts a mark on enemies it damages that last 0.0 seconds. When Geminate Attack procs, enemies with a mark within 0.0 range will also be attacked with a secondary attack

abilities.name: Time Lapse
abilities.description: Time Lapse may target allied Heroes with 500.0 cast range.

abilities.name: Shackleshot
abilities.description: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.6.

abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Windranger charges her bow for up to 1.0 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.description: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.description: Windranger channels the wind to gain 350.0 additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.

abilities.name: Gale Force
abilities.description: Vector Targeted. Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies in the target area towards the target direction.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.description: Windrun's enemy debuff has increased slow, reduces physical damage taken by 0.0%, and grants invisibility that is not broken by attacking or casting spells.

abilities.name: Arc Lightning
abilities.description: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units that deal a base damage and a percentage of their current health.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.description: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750.0 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in 325.0 range.

abilities.name: Heavenly Jump
abilities.description: Zeus performs a Heavenly Jump, leaping forward and shocking the closest visible nearby enemy (prioritizing heroes), dealing damage as well as reducing their movement and attack speed. Zeus gets 900 unobstructed vision around him for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.description:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.

Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck. If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

abilities.name: Lightning Hands
abilities.description: Zeus's gains bonus attack range and his attacks create Arc Lightnings that deal a percentage of it's damage.

abilities.name: Nimbus
abilities.description: Creates a storm cloud anywhere on the map that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Cask
abilities.description: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits. Each bounce deals more damage than the previous one. Deals 200.0% damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Voodoo Restoration
abilities.description: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units and damaging enemies for 100.0% of the heal value, costing Witch Doctor mana every second Voodoo Restoration is active.

abilities.name: Maledict
abilities.description: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes within its attack range. Lasts a maximum of 8.0 seconds. Death Ward has 50.0% bonus accuracy.

abilities.name: Voodoo Switcheroo
abilities.description: Turns Witch Doctor into a Death Ward briefly with reduced attack speed. He is hidden during this time.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.description: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Wraithfire Blast
abilities.description: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target. Summoned skeletons around the target will receive bonus movement and attack speed for the duration of the debuff.

abilities.name: Vampiric Spirit
abilities.description:
Restore health based on the damage Wraith King deals when attacking enemy units. Can be cast to summon skeletons with Vampiric Spirit. For every two kills Wraith King or any unit he controls accrue on enemy units, Vampiric Aura adds a skeleton charge. Skeletons respawn once when killed.

Skeletons deal less damage to buildings.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.description: Wraith King passively deals bonus damage on an attack with a cooldown.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900.0 radius will be slowed, and spawn 1.0 skeleton(s) to attack each nearby enemy hero. Can be self-cast to kill Wraith King instantly.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Causes Reincarnation to have no mana cost and increases Skeleton Spawn count.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Reduces cooldown by 40.0s. If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed and gain bonus attack and movement speed. Heroes who die this way respawn at a faster rate.
